Home
The Restuarant
menu
hours
Pdf_menu
GourmetToGo
Blank
Chef Paulina Tarducci worked with Frances Cannarsa Truant in the late 1970s to create the dishes that are still favorites at Giovanniâs Ristorante. The delicate blend of homemade pastas and original sauces originate from the San Marino region of Italy.
If there is something youâve had before, but itâs not on the menu, simply ask. We will do our best to accommodate special requests.
There are âDaily Featuresâ which emphasize what is fresh and locally grown. Chef Randy creates seasonal desserts â a Key Lime cheesecake in summer, a Pumpkin cheesecake for autumn â to complement the traditional favorites â Cannoli, Tira Misu and Spumoni.
Coming soon to Giovanniâs  â¦ More Farm-to-Table entrees, grown in the Giovanni community garden!

name: SheWolf Pastificio & Bar
raw_text:
MENU | Shewolf Detroit
ABOUT
MENU
RESERVATIONS
EVENTS
PARTY / EVENT
CATERING
GIFT CARDS
Select Page
MENU
3
MODERN ROMAN CUISINE
LED BY CHEF ANTHONY LOMBARDO
Chef started SheWolf in Midtown Detroit in 2017. He started by inviting friends and neighbors into his apartment for small intimate dinners that focused on the complexity of modern Roman cuisine. At SheWolf you will find that our primary focus is contemporary Italian cuisine that is inspired by old Rome. You might be surprised to find that our menu is less about red sauce and more about fresh vegetables and pasta made from hand milled flour. Our wine list is thoughtful and sophisticated and very Italian. Our food is Chef driven and inspired by the modern metropolis that Rome is today. Chef wants you to know that modern Italian cuisine is vibrant, seasonal and will excite you beyond measure.
DINNER & DRINKS

MENU

DINNER
El ASADOR TACO TRAYS
​
Great for an office lunch or those days when you need Chef Garza's cooking. Dozen per tray.
​
​
1. Steak or Chicken Fajita Taco —$30.00
Marinated tender meat with grilled bell peppers and onions served over corn tortilla and romaine lettuce, topped with avocado sauce and pico de gallo.
2.  Carne Asada or Chicken Taco —$25.00
Served over soft corn tortillas topped with sautéed onions cilantro and our homemade tomatillo and chipotle sauce.
3. Chorizo and Potato Taco —$22.00
Soft corn tortillas filled with spicy Mexican sausage and potatoes, topped with cilantro and onions.
4. The Original Taco —$25.00
Choose from ground beef or shredded chicken, hard corn or soft flour tortilla shell topped with lettuce, tomato, onions, sour cream, and cheese.
5. Mahi Mahi Taco —$30.00
Soft flour tortilla filled with grilled or fried mahi-mahi fish with citrus cabbage and cucumber relish topped with chipotle sauce.
6. Shrimp Diabla Taco —$30.00
Fried flour tortilla filled with sautéed shrimp in our signature spicy diablo sauce and topped with sliced avocado.
​
7. Mixed Tacos — $26.00
El ASADOR NACHO  PARTY TRAY
​
Be game day ready for Super Bowl Sunday! Also great for an office lunch.
(Serving up to four)
​
​
Corn tortilla chips piled high with refried beans, cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, jalapeños, green olives, avocado and sour cream —$18.00
Add-ons:
Shredded Chicken —$20.00
Ground Beef —$22.00
Grilled Vegetables —$20.00
Sautéed Shrimp —$25.00

A FAMILY OF FOUR DINNER TRAY
$50 DINNER MENU
All trays are $50, Halal, and include refried beans, rice, salad, chips and salsa.
Chile Rellenos
Roasted poblano pepper filled with your choice of vegetables, cheese, ground beef or chicken. Topped with roasted tomato sauce and cotija cheese.
​
Mole de Gallina

Enchiladas Verdes
Corn tortillas stuffed with shredded chicken and topped with fire-roasted green tomatillo sauce, sour cream onions, diced crispy potatoes, and crumbled cheese.
Enchiladas Rojas
Corn tortillas dipped in our homemade red sauce, stuffed with your choice of chicken, vegetables, beef or cheese. topped with lettuce, crispy zucchini, potatoes, onions, sour cream and queso fresco.
Quesadillas

Sautéed shrimp with onions, garlic, tomato, cilantro, and our spicy sauce.

for Catering, Private Parties, Reservations and Daily Specials

Whether you're planning an unforgettable private party, need top-notch catering, or looking to make a reservation for a special occasion, we've got you covered. Our daily specials feature fresh, seasonal ingredients that are sure to delight your taste buds. Let us take care of the details, so you can enjoy the moment.
DELICIOUS ITALIAN FOOD
We welcome you!
Treat yourself to a delicious meal served in an authentic Italian atmosphere. Antonio's Italian Cuisine provides great-tasting, fresh, authentic Italian food prepared with the highest quality of ingredients. You are sure to enjoy the great atmosphere, friendly service, and affordable prices at our Italian restaurant.

Newsletter
Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel
Review by - Google
five star review by
Alessandra R:
Absolutely phenomenal food! I am so very please from the plate shown to eggplant parm to pesto pasta everything was amazing! The waiter he was super professional and caring throughout our visit. We will be returning!!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Marzs:
Ordered carry out today to take to my daughter for her birthday. Food was excellent. The server made sure everything was perfect. Gave us plenty of bread too. Always a great experience eating in or carrying out.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Alica S:
We celebrated our daughter's birthday at Antonio's where we had THE BEST food and service. The waiter was excellent, very attentive and pleasant. All six different meals very top notch including appetizers. Gourmet food! Their mac and cheese lobster is the best I've ever had. Give them a try; you will not be disappointed.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Andrew N:
My wife and I came here for a date night and it was our first time ever coming to this restaurant. Our server was very kind, professional, and funny. Our food was very good, I'd highly recommend their Cream of Mushroom soup! Was thrilled that Friday was half-off bottles of wine, had no idea going in and found that was a great value, especially for a Friday night. Will absolutely be coming here again very soon!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Daniella T:
My boyfriend and I came here for dinner. Absolutely delicious food, wonderful service, huge portions. Everything was so clean and everything we ordered came out quick! Staff is super friendly. Will be coming back for sure!

Battle For The Houses is Here!
Two pizzas, one epic rivalry, served up Detroit-Style! The Wolverine brings the heat, while The State Square delivers unbeatable flavor.
$1 from each pizza goes to Ronald McDonald House Charities. Choose your side today!
See What's New!
View Your Location's Menu
The Original Detroit-Style Pizza
From timeless classics to bold new flavors, every Buddy’s pizza is built on our legendary Detroit-style crust—crispy on the edges, light and airy inside, and topped with premium ingredients. Handmade with pride since 1946. Build your own or try one of our Signature Squares.
Detroiter
Wisconsin brick cheese, pepperoni on top, tomato basil sauce, shaved Parmesan cheese and Buddy’s Sicilian spice blend.
Start Your Order
Sicilian
Wisconsin brick cheese, pepperoni, green peppers, black olives, salami, diced tomatoes, tomato basil sauce and Buddy’s Sicilian spice blend.
Start Your Order
Super 6 Mile
Wisconsin brick cheese, pepperoni, onions, green peppers, mushrooms and ham.
Start Your Order
Eastern Market Veggie
Wisconsin brick cheese, onions, green peppers, mushrooms and sliced tomatoes.
Start Your Order
Spicy Italian
Motor City cheese blend, Italian sausage, roasted red peppers, red onions, garlic, tomato basil sauce and Buddy's Sicilian spice blend.
Start Your Order
Hawaiian
Wisconsin brick cheese, ham, diced pineapple and Buddy’s BBQ sauce.
Start Your Order
Detroit Public TV
Original pepperoni under our Motor City cheese blend with Old World pepperoni on top.
Start Your Order
BBQ Conant
Wisconsin brick cheese, grilled chicken, red onions, fresh cilantro and Buddy’s BBQ sauce.
Start Your Order
Meat Deluxe
Wisconsin brick cheese, pepperoni, Italian sausage, ham, bacon and seasoned ground beef.
Start Your Order
The Henry Ford
Motor City cheese blend, red onions, seasoned ground beef, bacon, bleu cheese and tomato basil sauce.
Start Your Order
Mediterranean
Motor City cheese blend, red onions, spinach, beets, feta cheese, fresh dill, and tomato basil sauce.
Start Your Order
Greektown
Wisconsin brick cheese, feta cheese, spinach, garlic, red onions, diced tomatoes and fresh dill. Served with Buddy’s Original Garlic Parmesan dressing.
Start Your Order
Motown Museum
Motor City cheese blend, Old World pepperoni and bacon.
Start Your Order
Detroit Zoo
Motor City cheese blend, roasted tomatoes, fresh basil and tomato basil sauce.
Start Your Order
Margherita
Wisconsin brick cheese, diced tomatoes, garlic, oregano, fresh basil, Asiago cheese and tomato basil sauce.
Start Your Order
Fresh Salads
Fresh, flavorful, and made to order—our salads are piled high with crisp greens, quality toppings, and house-made dressings. The perfect start (or side) to your Buddy’s meal.
Antipasto
The original Buddy’s salad. Freshly chopped romaine and iceberg lettuce topped with imported ham, salami and Wisconsin brick cheese.
Start Your Order
Greek
Freshly chopped romaine and iceberg lettuce topped with feta cheese, beets, Kalamata olives, pepperoncini, tomatoes, cucumbers and red onions.
Start Your Order
House
Freshly chopped romaine and iceberg lettuce topped with red onions, cucumbers, carrots, garbanzo beans, tomatoes and croutons.
Start Your Order
Caesar
Freshly chopped romaine lettuce topped with shaved Parmesan cheese and croutons.
Start Your Order
Chicken Tender
Freshly chopped romaine and iceberg lettuce topped with our famous chicken tenders, red onions, cucumbers, carrots, tomatoes, and cheddar cheese. Served with Buddy's Original Ranch dressing.
Start Your Order
Buffalo-Style Chicken Tender
Freshley chopped romaine and iceberg lettuce topped with our famous chicken tenders tossed in mild or hot buffalo sauce, bleu cheese crumbles, red onions, cucumbers, carrots, tomatoes, and cheddar cheese. Served with Buddy's Original Ranch dressing.
Start Your Order
Starters
Kick things off right with Buddy’s starters—craveable classics like Buddy Bread, wings, and our famous Veggie Sampler, all made to share and packed with flavor.
Buddy Bread
Basket of Buddy’s famous oven-baked soft garlic sticks. Served with marinara sauce.
Start Your Order
Veggie Sampler
Fresh mushrooms, cauliflower, and zucchini hand-dipped in buttermilk dredged in seasoned flour and deep fried to a golden brown. Served with your choice of sauce.
Start Your Order
Buddy Wings
Plump, juicy chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with Buddy’s Original Bleu Cheese dressing and celery sticks.
Start Your Order
Chicken Tenders
Strips of tender chicken marinated in buttermilk, drenched in seasoned flour and deep fried to a golden brown. Served with your choice of sauce.
Start Your Order
Cheese Bread
Buddy's Original Detroit-Style crust topped with Wisconsin Brick, fontinella, mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. Served with Buddy's Original Ranch dressing.
Start Your Order
Oven-Baked Meatballs
Four of Buddy's homestyle meatballs smothered with your choice of sauce and oven-baked with mozzarella cheese. Served with garlic bread.
Start Your Order
Loaded Fries
Seasoned wedge-cut fries baked with mozzarella and cheddar cheese. Topped with bacon and served with Buddy’s Original Ranch dressing.
Start Your Order
Mozzarella Sticks
Eight golden brown cheese sticks sprinkled with Parmesan cheese. Served with marinara sauce.
Start Your Order
Garlic Bread
Grilled and sprinkled with Parmesan cheese. Try it baked with cheese add $1.
Start Your Order
Classic Pastas
Bold, flavorful, and made to please—our pastas feature classic Italian recipes, savory sauces, and plenty of cheese. A perfect complement to your pizza or a satisfying meal all on their own.
Spinach Lasagna
Layers of pasta, spinach, vegetables and ricotta topped with brick cheese smothered in our signature sauce.
Start Your Order
Cheese Lasagna
Layers of pasta, brick, ricotta, and Parmesan cheese smothered in our signature sauce.
Start Your Order
Spaghetti
Buddy's classic spaghetti with your choice of marinara or meat sauce.
Start Your Order
Mostaccioli
Traditional mostaccioli pasta with your choice of meat or marinara sauce.
Start Your Order
Cheese Ravioli
Classic pasta pillows filled with a four cheese blend. Served with your choice of meat or marinara sauce.
Start Your Order
Chicken Parmesan
Grilled chicken breast rolled in seasoned breadcrumbs and baked with mozzarella cheese. Served on spaghetti with your choice of marinara or meat sauce.
Start Your Order
Macaroni & Cheese
Elbow pasta with mozzarella and cheddar cheese blend topped with Cheddar cheese and panko crumbs. Oven baked to a golden brown.
Start Your Order
Chicken Alfredo
Traditional Alfredo sauce tossed with grilled chicken and fettuccine.
Start Your Order
Burgers & Sandwiches
Stacked, grilled, and loaded with flavor—our sandwiches and burgers are made with quality meats, fresh toppings, and served on toasted buns. Big on taste, perfect for any appetite.
Buddy Burger
½ lb. burger made from ground chuck with steak trimmings on a brioche bun. Topped with lettuce, tomato and dill chips.
Start Your Order
Bacon Cheddar Robby Burger
1/2 lb Burger loaded with bacon and cheddar cheese. Topped with our classic Robby Sauce, lettuce, and dill chips.
Start Your Order
Italian Chicken Sandwich
Marinated grilled chicken breast topped with provolone cheese, lettuce, tomato on a brioche bun.
Start Your Order
Italian Hoagie
Salami, ham, pepperoni and provolone cheese topped with banana peppers, shredded lettuce, tomato, Parmesan cheese and Buddy’s Sicilian spice blend served on an Italian roll with Buddy’s Famous Vinaigrette.
Start Your Order
Meatball Hoagie
Buddy’s homestyle meatballs topped with melted provolone cheese and marinara sauce served on a toasted Italian roll.
Start Your Order
Chicken Tender Hoagie
Buddy’s famous tenders topped with our Signature Dip Sauce, shredded lettuce and dill chips served on a homestyle roll.
Start Your Order
Grilled Steak Hoagie
Thinly sliced grilled ribeye topped with caramelized onions and melted provolone cheese served on a toasted hoagie bun with homestyle horseradish sauce. Add sauteeed mushrooms and green peppers for $1.
Start Your Order
Buffalo Chicken Wrap
Buddy’s famous tenders tossed with mild or hot buffalo sauce, cheddar cheese, shredded lettuce, tomato and Buddy’s Original Ranch dressing served in a wrap.

Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese and Buddy’s Classic Caesar dressing served in a wrap.

Fresh. Creative. Contemporary.
Every day, Streetside Seafood’s talented chefs serve up the best culinary creations from the nation’s seas, lakes, and streams. Our daily specials feature the season’s freshest catches with creative twists. You’ll find an award-winning wine list with offerings that complement any dish. Ready to dive into the freshest fare? We have a table waiting.
Fresh. Creative. Contemporary.
Every day, Streetside Seafood’s talented chefs serve up the best culinary creations from the nation’s seas, lakes, and streams. Our daily specials feature the season’s freshest catches with creative twists. You’ll find an award-winning wine list with offerings that complement any dish. Ready to dive into the freshest fare? We have a table waiting.
Try the best burger in town!
Enjoy our delicious entry in the BirminghamBURGER competition.
LEARN MORE
Join us for
a sweet weekend
We’re celebrating Sweetest Day October 17-19. Treat your sweetheart to our fresh seafood fare.
VIEW MENUS
“Food and service is always top notch. Had the perch on our server’s recommendation — it was delicious. Generous portion as well. Great date night destination!”
Wood W.
“Excellent selection of oysters and seafood. Small, quaint atmosphere inside. The staff has always treated me kindly here. 10/10 will dine again.”
Jamison M.
“Well known place; great bartenders and waitstaff. The best variety of dishes for all the seafood lovers!”
Susan W.
“Streetside Seafood rocks! Everything we’ve tried is delicious and their staff is friendly. My highest recommendation in Birmingham by far for restaurants!”
Abbie B.
“Great place and super nice staff. The server at the bar was great and friendly! Highly recommend this local place!”
Krystle R.
“Seasoned, pleasant, courteous, prompt, and can be flexible … recommending fine alternatives to meet the most discerning tastes. Amazing selection of seafood.”
Bill Z.

Menus
La Guardia’s menu features a wide selection of signature fresh pasta and choice grilled meats.
The broad range of cuisine, both inland and coastal, covers traditional and modern influences, allowing our Chef and his culinary team an open canvas from which to draw on.
La Guardia's seasonal and regional influences can be seen throughout each course of the menu.
​
Our simple interiors, music-inspired art, fine wines, spirits, and music invites guests to  enjoy a full experience.
La Guardia is a place to meet family, friends, and new acquaintances in a convivial atmosphere.
​
It’s been said, “Italians don’t eat to live, they live to eat.”
At La Guardia, food is more than our passion—it’s our life’s work.

Our Menus
At Big Rock Italian Chophouse, guests can indulge in both USDA prime steaks & chops and handmade pasta specialties immersed in rich, flavorful sauces. Savor time-honored, traditional favorites like Veal Parmesan, Lasagna and Branzino created in-house with care and expertise.

Menus
Wine List
THE WINES OF CELANI FAMILY VINEYARDS
“Old World Style Meets Napa Valley”
As the proprietor of the Celani Family Vineyards, Tom has chosen to bottle wine focusing on quality, not quantity. The greatest compliment he could receive is to have a perfect stranger tell him that his premiere vintage Ardore is the best wine that he — or she — has ever tasted. Meticulously crafted by winemaker Mark Herold, our line-up of limited production wines use both estate-grown Merlot, Chardonnay, Cabernet Franc, and Cabernet Sauvignon purchased from select vineyards in Coombsville and Mount Veeder.
Rosé, Celani Family Vineyards
California, 2024
15 | 22 | 60
Tremendously aromatic with fresh cranberry, pomegranate, and rose petals burst open on the palette with dried wildflower with a unique toasted notes from four months of age
Chardonnay, Celani Family Vineyards
Napa Valley, California, 2022
14 | 21 | 56
Produced in our 30-Foot Concrete Egg, estate-grown grapes are enormously complex and layered revealing Bosch pear, flinty minerals, white flowers, clean and fresh, with a hint of citrus
Red, Celani Family Vineyards, “Robusto,”
Napa Valley, California, 2021
11 | 16 | 44
This proprietary red is immediately generous with complexity, purity, and vibrancy possessing black cherry compote, black raspberries, and cranberries
Red Blend, Celani Family Vineyards, “Tenacious”
Napa Valley, California, 2022
25 | 37 | 100
Bold and complex with black cherry and a subtle hint of smokiness. This Right Bank style is seamless, opulent, and plush, showcasing mouthwatering savory notes with structured tannin
Cabernet Sauvignon, Celani Family Vineyards, “The Family”
Napa Valley, California, 2022
44 | 66 | 176
An enchanting bouquet of aromas ripe cassis. As it breathes, subtle hints of violet, black pepper, and mocha come to the forefront, adding depth and complexity
Cabernet Sauvignon, Celani Family, “Ardore”
Coombsville, California, 2022
87 | 130 | 348
Curated from our top ten barrels in the entire winery from 100% Cabernet Sauvignon. Purple stone fruit cascades, enveloping the senses with luxurious richness of balance and finesse

For connoisseurs with allergy concerns & dietary preferences, please seek the guidance of our staff. Food prepared in our restaurant may contain: milk, eggs, wheat, peanuts, and tree nuts.
Kindly be advised that 20% gratuity will be added to every bill.
Your continued patronage is greatly appreciated.

About the Business
Business owner information
Ping H.
Business Owner
We offer a superb collection of over 500 varieties of wine from all over the world, by the bottle or by the glass, paired with exceptional cheese, meats and tinned seafood, in a setting that is authentic and welcoming. 

The Royce Detroit is a destination for life's everyday essentials. We value tradition, sustainability and community. We aim to provide quality service, promote goods that are made with integrity, and support our community. We exist to create a delightful experience where passion and purpose come together. Our mission is to promote a lifestyle of thoughtful consumption and an awareness for the environment through the experience we offer.

name: Buddy's Pizza
raw_text:
Menu – Buddy's Pizza
Menu

Since 1946

Battle For The Houses is Here!
Two pizzas, one epic rivalry, served up Detroit-Style! The Wolverine brings the heat, while The State Square delivers unbeatable flavor.
$1 from each pizza goes to Ronald McDonald House Charities. Choose your side today!
See What's New!
View Your Location's Menu
The Original Detroit-Style Pizza
From timeless classics to bold new flavors, every Buddy’s pizza is built on our legendary Detroit-style crust—crispy on the edges, light and airy inside, and topped with premium ingredients. Handmade with pride since 1946. Build your own or try one of our Signature Squares.
Detroiter
Wisconsin brick cheese, pepperoni on top, tomato basil sauce, shaved Parmesan cheese and Buddy’s Sicilian spice blend.
Start Your Order
Sicilian
Wisconsin brick cheese, pepperoni, green peppers, black olives, salami, diced tomatoes, tomato basil sauce and Buddy’s Sicilian spice blend.
Start Your Order
Super 6 Mile
Wisconsin brick cheese, pepperoni, onions, green peppers, mushrooms and ham.
Start Your Order
Eastern Market Veggie
Wisconsin brick cheese, onions, green peppers, mushrooms and sliced tomatoes.
Start Your Order
Spicy Italian
Motor City cheese blend, Italian sausage, roasted red peppers, red onions, garlic, tomato basil sauce and Buddy's Sicilian spice blend.
Start Your Order
Hawaiian
Wisconsin brick cheese, ham, diced pineapple and Buddy’s BBQ sauce.
Start Your Order
Detroit Public TV
Original pepperoni under our Motor City cheese blend with Old World pepperoni on top.
Start Your Order
BBQ Conant
Wisconsin brick cheese, grilled chicken, red onions, fresh cilantro and Buddy’s BBQ sauce.
Start Your Order
Meat Deluxe
Wisconsin brick cheese, pepperoni, Italian sausage, ham, bacon and seasoned ground beef.
Start Your Order
The Henry Ford
Motor City cheese blend, red onions, seasoned ground beef, bacon, bleu cheese and tomato basil sauce.
Start Your Order
Mediterranean
Motor City cheese blend, red onions, spinach, beets, feta cheese, fresh dill, and tomato basil sauce.
Start Your Order
Greektown
Wisconsin brick cheese, feta cheese, spinach, garlic, red onions, diced tomatoes and fresh dill. Served with Buddy’s Original Garlic Parmesan dressing.
Start Your Order
Motown Museum
Motor City cheese blend, Old World pepperoni and bacon.
Start Your Order
Detroit Zoo
Motor City cheese blend, roasted tomatoes, fresh basil and tomato basil sauce.
Start Your Order
Margherita
Wisconsin brick cheese, diced tomatoes, garlic, oregano, fresh basil, Asiago cheese and tomato basil sauce.
Start Your Order
Fresh Salads
Fresh, flavorful, and made to order—our salads are piled high with crisp greens, quality toppings, and house-made dressings. The perfect start (or side) to your Buddy’s meal.
Antipasto
The original Buddy’s salad. Freshly chopped romaine and iceberg lettuce topped with imported ham, salami and Wisconsin brick cheese.
Start Your Order
Greek
Freshly chopped romaine and iceberg lettuce topped with feta cheese, beets, Kalamata olives, pepperoncini, tomatoes, cucumbers and red onions.
Start Your Order
House
Freshly chopped romaine and iceberg lettuce topped with red onions, cucumbers, carrots, garbanzo beans, tomatoes and croutons.
Start Your Order
Caesar
Freshly chopped romaine lettuce topped with shaved Parmesan cheese and croutons.
Start Your Order
Chicken Tender
Freshly chopped romaine and iceberg lettuce topped with our famous chicken tenders, red onions, cucumbers, carrots, tomatoes, and cheddar cheese. Served with Buddy's Original Ranch dressing.
Start Your Order
Buffalo-Style Chicken Tender
Freshley chopped romaine and iceberg lettuce topped with our famous chicken tenders tossed in mild or hot buffalo sauce, bleu cheese crumbles, red onions, cucumbers, carrots, tomatoes, and cheddar cheese. Served with Buddy's Original Ranch dressing.
Start Your Order
Starters
Kick things off right with Buddy’s starters—craveable classics like Buddy Bread, wings, and our famous Veggie Sampler, all made to share and packed with flavor.
Buddy Bread
Basket of Buddy’s famous oven-baked soft garlic sticks. Served with marinara sauce.
Start Your Order
Veggie Sampler
Fresh mushrooms, cauliflower, and zucchini hand-dipped in buttermilk dredged in seasoned flour and deep fried to a golden brown. Served with your choice of sauce.
Start Your Order
Buddy Wings
Plump, juicy chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with Buddy’s Original Bleu Cheese dressing and celery sticks.
Start Your Order
Chicken Tenders
Strips of tender chicken marinated in buttermilk, drenched in seasoned flour and deep fried to a golden brown. Served with your choice of sauce.
Start Your Order
Cheese Bread
Buddy's Original Detroit-Style crust topped with Wisconsin Brick, fontinella, mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. Served with Buddy's Original Ranch dressing.
Start Your Order
Oven-Baked Meatballs
Four of Buddy's homestyle meatballs smothered with your choice of sauce and oven-baked with mozzarella cheese. Served with garlic bread.
Start Your Order
Loaded Fries
Seasoned wedge-cut fries baked with mozzarella and cheddar cheese. Topped with bacon and served with Buddy’s Original Ranch dressing.
Start Your Order
Mozzarella Sticks
Eight golden brown cheese sticks sprinkled with Parmesan cheese. Served with marinara sauce.
Start Your Order
Garlic Bread
Grilled and sprinkled with Parmesan cheese. Try it baked with cheese add $1.
Start Your Order
Classic Pastas
Bold, flavorful, and made to please—our pastas feature classic Italian recipes, savory sauces, and plenty of cheese. A perfect complement to your pizza or a satisfying meal all on their own.
Spinach Lasagna
Layers of pasta, spinach, vegetables and ricotta topped with brick cheese smothered in our signature sauce.
Start Your Order
Cheese Lasagna
Layers of pasta, brick, ricotta, and Parmesan cheese smothered in our signature sauce.
Start Your Order
Spaghetti
Buddy's classic spaghetti with your choice of marinara or meat sauce.
Start Your Order
Mostaccioli
Traditional mostaccioli pasta with your choice of meat or marinara sauce.
Start Your Order
Cheese Ravioli
Classic pasta pillows filled with a four cheese blend. Served with your choice of meat or marinara sauce.
Start Your Order
Chicken Parmesan
Grilled chicken breast rolled in seasoned breadcrumbs and baked with mozzarella cheese. Served on spaghetti with your choice of marinara or meat sauce.
Start Your Order
Macaroni & Cheese
Elbow pasta with mozzarella and cheddar cheese blend topped with Cheddar cheese and panko crumbs. Oven baked to a golden brown.
Start Your Order
Chicken Alfredo
Traditional Alfredo sauce tossed with grilled chicken and fettuccine.
Start Your Order
Burgers & Sandwiches
Stacked, grilled, and loaded with flavor—our sandwiches and burgers are made with quality meats, fresh toppings, and served on toasted buns. Big on taste, perfect for any appetite.
Buddy Burger
½ lb. burger made from ground chuck with steak trimmings on a brioche bun. Topped with lettuce, tomato and dill chips.
Start Your Order
Bacon Cheddar Robby Burger
1/2 lb Burger loaded with bacon and cheddar cheese. Topped with our classic Robby Sauce, lettuce, and dill chips.
Start Your Order
Italian Chicken Sandwich
Marinated grilled chicken breast topped with provolone cheese, lettuce, tomato on a brioche bun.
Start Your Order
Italian Hoagie
Salami, ham, pepperoni and provolone cheese topped with banana peppers, shredded lettuce, tomato, Parmesan cheese and Buddy’s Sicilian spice blend served on an Italian roll with Buddy’s Famous Vinaigrette.
Start Your Order
Meatball Hoagie
Buddy’s homestyle meatballs topped with melted provolone cheese and marinara sauce served on a toasted Italian roll.
Start Your Order
Chicken Tender Hoagie
Buddy’s famous tenders topped with our Signature Dip Sauce, shredded lettuce and dill chips served on a homestyle roll.
Start Your Order
Grilled Steak Hoagie
Thinly sliced grilled ribeye topped with caramelized onions and melted provolone cheese served on a toasted hoagie bun with homestyle horseradish sauce. Add sauteeed mushrooms and green peppers for $1.
Start Your Order
Buffalo Chicken Wrap
Buddy’s famous tenders tossed with mild or hot buffalo sauce, cheddar cheese, shredded lettuce, tomato and Buddy’s Original Ranch dressing served in a wrap.
Start Your Order
Chicken Caesar Wrap
Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese and Buddy’s Classic Caesar dressing served in a wrap.
Start Your Order
Greek Wrap
Feta cheese, romaine lettuce, beets, black olives, red onion, tomato, banana peppers and Buddy’s Original Garlic Parmesan dressing served in a wrap.
Start Your Order
Sweets & Treats
Finish on a sweet note with our delicious desserts—classic favorites and indulgent treats that are the perfect ending to your Buddy’s meal.
Lemon Cake
Drizzled with a lemon coulis.
Start Your Order
Tiramisu
The Italian favorite with espresso-soaked lady fingers and mascarpone cream layered with cocoa.
Start Your Order

ARANCINI

$12

Whipped Ricotta and Goat Cheese, with Roasted Tomato's, and Garlic. Served with Toasted Bread.
$17
ARROSTICINI
A traditional staple in Abruzzo cuisine, Arrosticini is a very simple small cut of Lamb on a skewer, seasoned with only Kosher Salt. (6 Skewers)
$17
My New Option
12 Skewers

Prepared in house, breaded and lightly fried, served with homemade Cocktail Sauce.

Natural Pork shoulder from our local Farmer, Savory, fatty, and crisp skin our Porchetta is an Italian culinary tradition. Served in with Rapini and our house Potato Bread. Half Pound.

New Fall Specials in Southgate, MI
Chicken & Shrimp Spaghetti Carbonara
Spaghetti tossed in a rich bacon cream sauce with eggs, parmesan, romano cheese, and diced tomatoes, topped with bacon, wood-grilled chicken and shrimp
Order Now
New! Flavors for Fall
Savor cozy and refreshing fall drinks. New! Orchard Sangria – this cocktail blends Tuaca liqueur, Bonizio white wine, apple juice, blood orange and fig. Rosemary Lemon Drop – Absolut vodka, house-made rosemary honey syrup, and fresh sweet & sour. Fig Bourbon Sour – Elijah Craig bourbon, fig, rosemary honey syrup, and a splash of sweet & sour. Spirit-free versions also available.

Frequently Asked Questions
Do you have vegan/vegetarian options?
Expand or collapse answer
We do have a delicious Vegan and Vegetarian menu to choose from. Please use the following link to find it:
https://www.carrabbas.com/nutrition
Do you have a Gluten Free menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes. Please visit our website at
www.carrabbas.com
and enter your city and state, or zip code in the search box provided. View a menu by clicking on "more info" and then "download a menu" and our Gluten Free offerings will be marked with GF.
Where can I add a missing visit for Dine Rewards?
Expand or collapse answer
Please visit
https://www.dine-rewards.com/
and click "Add a Visit." Enter the phone number associated with your Dine Rewards account and complete the form to have your credit manually applied. If you no longer have the receipt, please contact the restaurant directly and they will be happy to help you locate it.
Do you have outdoor seating?
Expand or collapse answer
Many of our restaurants have patio seating. Please contact your local Carrabba's to see if outdoor dining is available.
Do you have a Kids menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes, we do have a menu for kids 10 and under.
Click here to view the Kids menu
Give The Gift Of Carrabba's
BUY NOW
About Carrabba's Italian Grill
Southgate, MI
Offering authentic Italian cuisine passed down from our founders' family recipes, Carrabba's Italian Grill® uses only the best ingredients to prepare fresh and handmade dishes cooked to order in a lively exhibition kitchen. Featuring a wood-burning grill inspired by the many tastes of Italy, guests can enjoy signature dishes, including Chicken Bryan, Pollo Rosa Maria, Wood-Fire Grilled Steak and chops and classic Italian Pasta dishes in a welcoming, contemporary atmosphere.
Managing Partner: Lauren Staley
Location: Dix and Eureka Rd. Across from the Walmart.

I hate tools that make you sign up before you can even try them. This one just works. I use it to find domains for client projects — it’s quick, gives Moz and Majestic scores, and some other custom data I’ve not seen elsewhere. Would happily pay for it, but glad I don’t have to!

Frequently Asked Questions
Your queries answered
What is ExpiredDomains.com?
ExpiredDomains.com is a free online platform that helps users find valuable expired and expiring domain names. It aggregates domain data from hundreds of top-level domains (TLDs) and displays them in a searchable, filterable format. Whether you’re seeking domains with SEO authority, existing traffic, or strong brand potential, the platform provides tools and insights to support smarter decisions.
Is there a cost to use the platform?
No, the platform is completely free to use. You can browse listings, view metrics, and apply filters without needing to sign up or pay any fees. There are no hidden charges or usage restrictions.
Can I register domains directly through the site?
No, ExpiredDomains.com does not register domains itself. Instead, it connects you to trusted external registrars and marketplaces like GoDaddy. You’ll be directed to complete your purchase or place a bid through their platform.
How often is the domain data updated?
The domain data is updated daily to ensure you're always seeing the most current listings, prices, and metrics. This includes newly expired domains, auction updates, and fresh insights from third-party tools and proprietary systems.
What tools and filters are available on the platform?
You can filter domains by TLD, keyword, length, backlink profile, SEO score, traffic estimates, and more. The platform also includes proprietary metrics like Estimated Auction Price, BrandRank, and SEO Price, alongside trusted data from sources like MOZ and Majestic.

ABOUT US
The oldest garage east of the Mississippi was born to serve one purpose but is now preserved to serve another. While the service provided inside the walls of this Woodward Avenue landmark has changed, the foundation of quality craftsmanship laid by the Kurta and Marwil families remains that same; finetuned and authentic. With burgers, Union Mac & Cheese, tacos, coal-fired pies and the like, the new crew is working to keep the legend of Vinsetta Garage alive.
Custom cakes now available from Union Catering!
Order Now

Frequently Asked Questions
Do you have vegan/vegetarian options?
Expand or collapse answer
We do have a delicious Vegan and Vegetarian menu to choose from. Please use the following link to find it:
https://www.carrabbas.com/nutrition
Do you have a Gluten Free menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes. Please visit our website at
www.carrabbas.com
and enter your city and state, or zip code in the search box provided. View a menu by clicking on "more info" and then "download a menu" and our Gluten Free offerings will be marked with GF.
Where can I add a missing visit for Dine Rewards?
Expand or collapse answer
Please visit
https://www.dine-rewards.com/
and click "Add a Visit." Enter the phone number associated with your Dine Rewards account and complete the form to have your credit manually applied. If you no longer have the receipt, please contact the restaurant directly and they will be happy to help you locate it.
Do you have outdoor seating?
Expand or collapse answer
Many of our restaurants have patio seating. Please contact your local Carrabba's to see if outdoor dining is available.
Do you have a Kids menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes, we do have a menu for kids 10 and under.
Click here to view the Kids menu
Give The Gift Of Carrabba's
BUY NOW
About Carrabba's Italian Grill
Novi, MI
Offering authentic Italian cuisine passed down from our founders' family recipes, Carrabba's Italian Grill® uses only the best ingredients to prepare fresh and handmade dishes cooked to order in a lively exhibition kitchen. Featuring a wood-burning grill inspired by the many tastes of Italy, guests can enjoy signature dishes, including Chicken Bryan, Pollo Rosa Maria, Wood-Fire Grilled Steak and chops and classic Italian Pasta dishes in a welcoming, contemporary atmosphere.
Managing Partner: Elizabeth Taylor

Our Menu.
Bravo!
Italian, Authentic, Delicious – Take a look at our amazing dishes
Bravo! Italian Kitchen takes great care in preparing each dish to order, with the highest quality and freshest ingredients for our modern Italian menu. Whether you’re in the mood for our flavorful made-to-order pasta, the perfect steak or fresh seafood, along with fresh salads and decadent desserts, it’s always the best time to gather with friends, family, and co-workers! Join us for a great Italian meal in the restaurant or take out to enjoy at home.
Select
Locations
for pricing
Dinner
Brunch
Lunch
Catering
Happy Hour
FAMILY BUNDLES
Family Bundle Spaghetti
Family Bundle Spaghetti
Spaghetti Pomodoro served with your choice of salad.

Upgrade your Spaghetti Pomodoro by adding Bolognese Sauce or House-Made Meatballs. Don’t forget to add a delicious Caramel Mascarpone Cheesecake or Tiramisu to your bundle!

Feeds 4 people.
Family Bundle Specialty Pasta
Your choice of pasta & salad.

Don’t forget to add a delicious Caramel Mascarpone Cheesecake or Tiramisu to your bundle!

Feeds 4 people.
Famly Bundle Specialty Chicken
Your choice of entrée & salad.

Don’t forget to add a delicious Caramel Mascarpone Cheesecake or Tiramisu to your bundle!

Feeds 4 people.

GARDEN SALADS

LAND & SEA
Chicken Marsala

PARMS

crispy chicken fingers, fries, fresh fruit
DESSERT
Tiramisu

Molten chocolate cake, anglaise, vanilla bean gelato (V)
Chocolate Chip Bread Pudding
Warm chocolate chip bread pudding served with vanilla gelato
Ask your server for our extensive Beverage, Beer & Wine menus
Modern Italian Food For Dine In Or To Go
At Bravo! Italian Kitchen we believe food prepared with the freshest and highest quality ingredients is best shared with family and friends! How better to make memories that will last a lifetime? Ask your server for the perfect wine or crafted cocktail to enjoy along with our crispy Calamari or Margherita Flatbread made with vine-ripened tomatoes, fresh mozzarella & basil to start your meal. Discover our famous Pasta Woozie with grilled chicken tossed with fresh fettuccine, house-made alfredo & fresh spinach. Make it a Bravo! dinner to remember with our Filet Mignon with grilled asparagus, mashed potatoes; New York Strip cooked to perfection, or Chicken Scaloppine with pan seared mushrooms, tomatoes, provolone, feta, lemon caper butter over herb linguine. Whether you’re enjoying a casual meal with friends, romantic dinner for two or celebrating a special occasion with family and friends, the Bravo! menu is the perfect way to indulge in all your favorite Italian dishes.
We’re open seven days a week, offering lunch & dinner with Brunch on weekends. Make
RESERVATIONS
and dine in or
ORDER NOW
for Bravo! Italian food delivery or curbside pickup. Planning a gathering for 20 or more? Click
GROUP DINING
to get all the details you need to plan your special event, birthday party, family celebration, or corporate event. Want the best Italian food delivered? Visit our
CATERING
page for easy ordering for 10 or more. Join us for a great Italian dinner in the restaurant or take out to enjoy at home.

La Jalisciense has been a Mexicantown staple for over a decade, serving authentic Mexican cuisine and cultural tradition.
in 2025, We Expanded to Taylor
with a fast-casual location, continuing our legacy of family recipes, warm hospitality, and community connection.

Main Menu
Menu
Lunch, Dinner, and Drink Menus
Savor a Diverse Array of Tasty Authentic Mexican Dishes at Las Palapas
At Las Palapas, we understand how important it is to offer diners choices. Some days, you might come to us for the best tacos near me, while other diners might order our burritos near me. Other times, you might crave our fresh seafood dishes, a juicy steak, or flavorful enchiladas. When your eyes pour over our menu, various classic and exotic Mexican dishes await you at Las Palapas.
We've noticed that people tend to choose different dishes for lunch and dinner. While we offer a variety of Mexican food, each dish offers generous portions, fresh ingredients, and tremendous value. We complement our lunch and dinner selections with a diverse menu of refreshing beverages. From our traditional favorites to unique house specialties, our drinks enhance the best Mexican food near me.
Lunch Menu
From mild to wild, our lunch offerings are richly seasoned and fantastically flavorful. Get more for your money with our delicious $6.99 combo plates.
Dinner Menu
Variety is the spice of life when it comes to our dinner menu. Choose any of our well-seasoned dinner offerings to enjoy a taste of Mexico.
Drink Menu
Enjoy our selection of soft drinks, beers, and mixed Mexican drinks. Check out our Tequila menu and other drink options.
Salud
!
Takeout at Las Palapas: Authentic Mexican Food for Busy Metro Detroiters
While our vibrant, festive atmosphere enhances your dining pleasure, sometimes you don't have time to dine with us. We encourage you to enjoy our Mexican cuisine at home or work. All our delicious lunch and dinner options are available for pickup at your convenience. Order online and make your home a gourmet Mexican restaurant with the best Mexican takeout near me.
Best Mexican Takeout Near Me: Place Your Online Order with Us Today
If you need a to-go order of the best burritos near me, we’ll make it happen. You can order anything from us online and pick it up at our location in Livonia, MI. We believe you should be able to enjoy all our delicious options for the best at-home dining experience. Thanks to our dedication to your satisfaction and enjoyment, ordering authentic Mexican cuisine has never been easier. Swing in and say
hola
to us at Las Palapas today!

Order Tacos Online
Taco Delivery
Order Via UberEats
VIEW THE MENU
PDF MENU
Chef Amado Lopez
Chef Amado Lopez began his culinary career in the world famous Chef Charlie Trotter’s kitchen in Chicago. Chef Trotter recognized his talent and sent him to the Culinary Institute of America on a full scholarship from the Charlie Trotter Foundation. After culinary school in New York, Chef Lopez headed back to Chicago to work for Chef Shawn McClain at his restaurants Spring, Green Zebra, and Custom House. Soon Chef Lopez realized his true epicurean passion was closer to home; Mexican cuisine was his calling. This eventually drew him to Chef Rick Bayless; where began working at Topolobampo. In the five years Chef Lopez traveled to Mexico with Chef Bayless on many culinary tours, managed the kitchens, developed recipes and opened Xoco. While at Xoco, Chef Lopez was approached by an investor and together they opened Habanero, a taqueria in the financial district of downtown Chicago. In 2015, he moved his family to their home in Rochester where he worked as the Executive Catering Chef at Plum Market. Now, Chef Lopez is pursuing his dream of owning his own Taqueria in Berkley, Michigan.
Recently in January 2023 Chef Amado was named as a semifinalist for the James Beard Foundation in the Emerging Chef category.

Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
Now Hiring! Love your job, love your life!
Apply Now
HOLA FOLKS!
Latin dishes with faraway influences that are right at home right here.
Oh, and tequila… mezcal… coffee, pastries and whatnot.
As the only joint on this bustling multi-mile stretch of Big Beaver that’s one-of-one… Gran Castor has a certain obligation to represent the independent spirit on a chain-strewn corridor: and that’s what this crew does dish after dish and drink upon drink.
Crafted tacos. Inspired pizzas. Burly bowls. Baristas at the ready. Homey pastries.
And cocktails that are straightforward and anything but straight at the same time
EATGRANCASTOR
GRANCASTOR

About the Business
Alteños Restaurant – Authentic Mexican Flavor in Lincoln Park

Welcome to Alteños Restaurant, your new go-to spot for traditional Mexican food with a modern touch. We specialize in the rich, bold flavors of Jalisco, offering dishes like quesabirrias, fajitas, tacos, enchiladas, caldos, mariscos, and much more — all made with authentic ingredients and heart.

Whether you’re stopping by for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, you’ll enjoy a welcoming atmosphere, friendly service, and generous portions full of flavor.

Located in Lincoln Park, Michigan
Dine-in, takeout, and delivery available
Daily specials
New ownership and updated menu

Come taste the tradition at Alteños Restaurant!

Menu FAQs
K
L
What appetizers do you offer at Los Tres Amigos Livonia?
Appetizers include Jalapeño Poppers, Corn Kickers, French Fries, Sample Platter, Chori‑Papas, Chicken Tenders, Botana, Nachos Bravos, Nachos Amigos, Nachos Toluca, Elotes, Nachos al Carbón, Fajita Nachos, Queso Fundido, Guacamole Dip, Bean Dip, and Cheese Dip.
K
L
What fajita options are available at the Livonia location?
You can choose between marinated chicken, sirloin steak, shrimp, or combos like Fajipiña, Fajita Amigos, and Fajita Especial Amigos (chicken/steak/shrimp). Or, there is a seafood option, Fajitas del Mar (talapia/scallops/imitation crab meat/shrimp), and an all-vegetable option.
K
L
Do you have birria tacos?
Yes — Tacos de Birria are featured alongside a consommé served with slow‑cooked beef, onion, cilantro, and lime.
K
L
What lunch specials do you offer?
The lunch menu includes items like Fajita Quesadilla, Burrito Azteca (potatoes, scrambled eggs, Mexican sausage), Taco Lunch, Tamal Lunch, and Speedy Gonzáles (one taco, one enchilada, choice of rice or refried beans).
K
L
Is the menu bilingual?
We offer our menu in both English and Spanish!
View the one that works best for you:
English Menu
Menú en Español

Welcome
Eat. Drink. Enjoy.
We pride ourselves in serving the most authentic Mexican cuisine in Southeast Michigan. We are known for our great home-style food, great friends, and great atmosphere.
Read more
about us
Reviews
review by - Yelp
Gizelle P:
My favorite Mexican restaurant downriver! My family eats here at least once a week. The service is quick and the food is always delicious. I'm never disappointed. If you want amazing salsa and great food this is the spot to go.
review by - Yelp
Caroline M:
Really enjoyed this restaurant. All four of us got margaritas and they were delicious. I got the burrito combination dinner with the grilled chicken and really enjoyed all of the variety that came with it. It was all very yummy.
review by - Yelp
KayLen R:
Love, love, love their service.  My friends and I went there to celebrate our birthdays and we had a great time.  The food is good and the drinks are amazing.  Definitely coming back for more.  I think they did an amazing job to keep everyone safe, we felt very comfortable dining here.
review by - Yelp
Tracy H:
The waiter was awesome. He was very attentive. Loved the Lava Colada and Bahama Mama. I had the Enchiladas and they were pretty good. I do like their rice, it's different and tasty. Fried Ice Cream was a hit with us and the kids!
review by - Yelp
Misty M:
Love everyone about this place- ambience, food, staff and their prices! We always come here be it a regular day or holidays and everything remains good!i have recommended this place to a lot of people and has never heard a bad thing about it!

House-made triangle pastries filled with special Paradise ‘clotted cream’  and topped with honey & pistachio
$7.95
Gajar Ka Halwa
Warm traditional dessert pudding made with fresh carrot, milk, and ghee, flavored with cardamom and topped with roasted raisins, cashew, and pistachio
$7.95
Rice Kheer
Classic Indian rice pudding made with Basmati rice, flavored with cardamom, saffron, golden raisin and roasted pistachio nuts
$7.95
Orange Kulfi
Special traditional 'ice cream' made by slowly condensing whole milk flavored with cardamom, allowed to set inside whole orange peel, and sliced frozen into wedges for serving
$8.95
Sizzling Chocolate Brownie
Fresh moist walnut brownies made in house topped with vanilla ice cream and served sizzling on a skillet with hot chocolate sauce
$8.95
Royal Rose Falooda
Housemade traditional rose-flavored milkshake with sweet basil seeds, long rice vermicelli, fruit jellies, ice cream, cardamom, mixed nuts
$7.95
Royal Mango Mastani
A fun traditional mango milkshake topped with ice cream, whipped cream, mango boba, cardamom, pistachio, almond & saffron
$8.95
Honey-Nut Ashta Dosa
South Indian fusion 'crepe' made with honey and pistachio, lightly filled with special Paradise clotted-cream & mixed nuts, served with Ice cream
$9.95
Chocolate Pani Puri
A fusion sweet take on the pani puri classic, made with homemade brownie bits, fruit jellies, roasted nuts, rosemilk shots & served with vanilla ice cream
$9.95
Sweet Paan
(1) traditional sweet Indian mouth freshener (meetha, or betal quid) made from chopped betal nuts, date bits, fragranced dry fruit, candied fennel/seeds and wrapped in betal leaf
$2.95

name: Deshi Kitchen Indian Cuisine
raw_text:
Deshi kitchen Indian cuisine
Deshi kitchen Indian cuisine
Home
Gallery
Menu
Deshi Kitchen Indian Cuisine stands as a culinary beacon, where authenticity meets innovation in every carefully crafted dish. The establishment has distinguished itself through its masterful execution of both traditional favorites and unique specialties, earning devoted patrons who return weekly to savor their exceptional offerings. The restaurant's culinary excellence shines particularly bright in their signature dishes, including their renowned Chicken Hot and Sour Soup and the meticulously prepared Chicken Tikka Masala. Their Palak Paneer has earned special recognition for its exceptional flavor profile, while their Butter Chicken maintains the perfect balance of rich, aromatic spices. The kitchen's expertise extends to their bread selection, featuring pillowy Naan and butter-enriched Paratha, with the unique Kashmiri Naan incorporating cherries and pineapple for an innovative twist. The establishment's commitment to quality manifests in their generous portions, perfectly cooked basmati rice, and a dessert menu featuring classics like Gulab Jamun and the delicate Rasmali. Their sophisticated spice calibration system allows diners to customize their preferred heat levels, from mild to intense, ensuring each dish meets individual preferences.
43095 Hayes Rd, Sterling Heights, MI 48313
(586) 566-1006
Operating with consistent excellence in both dine-in and takeout services, Deshi Kitchen has established itself as a premier destination for authentic Indian cuisine, where traditional recipes meet contemporary dining expectations.

Frequently Asked Questions
Your queries answered
What is ExpiredDomains.com?
ExpiredDomains.com is a free online platform that helps users find valuable expired and expiring domain names. It aggregates domain data from hundreds of top-level domains (TLDs) and displays them in a searchable, filterable format. Whether you’re seeking domains with SEO authority, existing traffic, or strong brand potential, the platform provides tools and insights to support smarter decisions.
Is there a cost to use the platform?
No, the platform is completely free to use. You can browse listings, view metrics, and apply filters without needing to sign up or pay any fees. There are no hidden charges or usage restrictions.
Can I register domains directly through the site?
No, ExpiredDomains.com does not register domains itself. Instead, it connects you to trusted external registrars and marketplaces like GoDaddy. You’ll be directed to complete your purchase or place a bid through their platform.
How often is the domain data updated?
The domain data is updated daily to ensure you're always seeing the most current listings, prices, and metrics. This includes newly expired domains, auction updates, and fresh insights from third-party tools and proprietary systems.
What tools and filters are available on the platform?
You can filter domains by TLD, keyword, length, backlink profile, SEO score, traffic estimates, and more. The platform also includes proprietary metrics like Estimated Auction Price, BrandRank, and SEO Price, alongside trusted data from sources like MOZ and Majestic.

All day menu..
Dive into authentic street food, crispy appetizers, hearty curries, and fragrant biryanis. Enjoy South Indian classics like dosa, uthappam, and rava dosa, or mix it up with our combo specials. Don’t forget to finish with a sweet Indian dessert and refreshing beverage. Every bite is a taste of India!
Street Food
Veg Samosa (2 pcs)
...signature appetizer, delightfully crisp pastries filled with a savory blend of spiced potatoes, peas, and aromatic herbs. Each golden triangle bursts with flavors, delivering a satisfying crunch with every bite. Served with tangy tamarind and mint chutneys, it's the perfect way to kick-start your culinary journey.
Vegetarian
Vegan
Has Gluten

...unique twist on the classic samosa. These crispy pastries are filled with a delightful combination of caramelized onions , perfectly seasoned with aromatic spices. Served with tangy tamarind and mint chutneys, this fusion of flavors is sure to be a hit.

...tantalizing twist on our classic samosas, this dish takes it to the next level. We take our freshly made samosas and layer them with a medley of chickpeas, yogurt, chutneys, and a sprinkle of chaat masala. The combination of textures and flavors creates an explosion of taste in your mouth—crispy, tangy, and creamy all at once. It's a crowd-pleaser that will leave you craving for more.

...Mumbai specialty, Pav Bhaji is a medley of vegetables, slow-cooked to perfection with a blend of aromatic spices, and served with buttered pav buns. This rich and flavorful curry is a true comfort food, guaranteed to satisfy your cravings. Don't forget to squeeze a dash of lemon and enjoy the symphony of flavors.

...popular street food from Mumbai, Vada Pav is a scrumptious combination of a spiced potato fritter, known as Vada, nestled between a soft, pillowy bun, Pav. Served with fried green chilii,This flavorful creation is a true delight for your taste buds.
Vegetarian
Has Gluten
Samosa Pav (2 pcs)
...delectable twist on the classic samosa, Samosa Pav features a triangular patty filled with a delicious blend of potatoes, peas, and spices, served inside a soft pav bun. A symphony of textures and flavors awaits you,. It's a crowd-favorite that will transport you to the bustling streets of India.

...for those seeking a milder heat, our cut mirchi is the perfect choice. These mildly spiced and tangy green chili fritters are sliced lengthwise, delicately battered, and fried to a golden crisp. Paired with a zesty chutney, this appetizer strikes the ideal balance between flavor and heat.

Ghee Podi Idly (4 pcs)
...ghee podi idly is a mouthwatering South Indian dish, featuring fluffy idlis smothered in a delectable mixture of ghee and spicy podi (powder). The idlis are typically steamed to perfection, then coated with a generous layer of ghee infused with aromatic spices like cumin, mustard seeds, and curry leaves, along with fiery gun powder. This fusion of rich ghee and flavorful podi creates a delightful symphony of textures and tastes, making ghee podi idly a beloved breakfast or snack option, packed with both comfort and spice.

Rice & Bread
Plain Naan
...plain naan is a versatile Indian flatbread, renowned for its soft, pillowy texture and slightly charred exterior. Made from a simple dough of flour, water, yeast, and a pinch of salt, it's traditionally cooked in a tandoor oven, resulting in a delightful combination of chewiness and crispiness. With its neutral flavor, plain naan complements a wide range of dishes, from savory curries to grilled meats, or can be enjoyed on its own as a satisfying accompaniment. Its simplicity allows it to serve as a versatile canvas for various toppings or fillings, making it a beloved staple in Indian cuisine.
Vegetarian
Has Gluten
Butter Naan
...butter naan is a classic Indian flatbread known for its soft, pillowy texture and rich, buttery flavor. Baked in a tandoor oven, it emerges with a delightful golden-brown exterior and a tender interior. Before serving, it's generously brushed with melted butter, enhancing its taste and aroma. Perfectly versatile, butter naan complements a wide range of dishes, from savory curries to grilled meats. Its buttery goodness makes it an irresistible choice for dipping into sauces or enjoying on its own as a comforting snack.
Vegetarian
Has Gluten
Garlic Naan
...garlic roti is a savory flatbread infused with the pungent aroma and flavor of fresh garlic. The dough is traditionally made with whole wheat flour, kneaded with minced garlic cloves and other seasonings before being rolled out and cooked on a griddle or skillet. As it cooks, the garlic releases its fragrant essence, imparting a deliciously robust taste to the roti. This versatile bread complements a wide range of dishes, from spicy curries to simple dal, or can be savored on its own with a dollop of yogurt or chutney. Garlic roti offers a delightful culinary experience with every bite.

Vegetarian
Plain Roti
...plain roti is a simple yet essential staple in Indian cuisine, made from whole wheat flour, water, and salt. This unleavened flatbread is rolled into thin circles and cooked on a hot griddle until it puffs up with golden brown spots. With its soft texture and subtle nutty flavor, plain roti serves as a versatile accompaniment to various dishes, from flavorful curries to savory dips. It's a wholesome and nutritious addition to any meal, providing a comforting base that complements a wide range of flavors and textures.
Has Gluten
Vegetarian
Butter Roti
...butter roti is a simple yet indulgent Indian flatbread, made from whole wheat flour and generously brushed with melted butter. The dough is rolled out into thin rounds and cooked on a hot griddle until golden brown and slightly crispy. As it cooks, the butter infuses the roti, imparting a rich and savory flavor that complements a wide range of dishes. Whether served alongside curries, stews, or enjoyed on its own, butter roti offers a comforting and satisfying addition to any meal, cherished for its soft texture and buttery goodness.
Has Gluten
Vegetarian
Garlic Roti
...garlic roti is a fragrant and flavorful flatbread, infused with the pungent aroma and taste of fresh garlic. The dough is typically made from whole wheat flour and kneaded with minced garlic, imparting a distinctively savory essence. Rolled thinly and cooked on a griddle or skillet, garlic roti develops a crispy exterior while remaining soft and chewy inside. Its intense garlic flavor adds depth to any meal, making it a versatile accompaniment to a wide range of Indian dishes. Enjoyed hot off the stove, garlic roti satisfies both the palate and the senses with its irresistible aroma and taste.
Has Gluten
Vegetarian
Bullet Naan (chilli naan)
...green chilli naan is a zesty twist on traditional naan, featuring finely chopped green chillies mixed into the dough. Baked to golden perfection in a tandoor or oven, each bite offers a delightful kick of heat balanced with the softness of the bread. This spicy variant adds an exciting dimension to any meal, complementing a wide range of Indian dishes or serving as a flavorful snack on its own.
Has Gluten
Vegetarian
Cheese Naan
...cheese naan is a delectable variation of traditional naan bread, generously filled with gooey melted cheese. Soft and fluffy, it's baked to perfection in a tandoor or oven, boasting a delightful combination of chewy texture and creamy cheese goodness. Each bite offers a satisfying burst of cheesy flavor, making it a favorite accompaniment to Indian dishes or a delicious snack on its own. Whether paired with savory curries or enjoyed solo, cheese naan is sure to tantalize taste buds and leave a lasting impression with its irresistible blend of warmth and indulgence.
Has Gluten
Vegetarian
Chilli Cheese Naan
...chilli cheese naan is a fiery twist on the traditional naan bread, packed with spicy green chillies and oozing melted cheese. The dough is infused with finely chopped chillies, then generously stuffed with cheese and baked to golden perfection. Each bite offers a burst of heat from the chillies complemented by the creamy richness of the cheese. Perfectly paired with savory Indian curries or enjoyed solo as a delicious snack, chilli cheese naan is a flavorful indulgence sure to tantalize the taste buds.
Has Gluten
Vegetarian
Onion Kulcha
...onion kulcha is a savory Indian bread, renowned for its soft, fluffy texture and aromatic onion filling. Made by kneading dough with finely chopped onions and fresh herbs, it's cooked in a tandoor oven or skillet until golden brown. The onions infuse the bread with a delightful sweetness and depth of flavor, while the herbs add a fragrant touch. Served hot and brushed with ghee or butter, onion kulcha pairs perfectly with a variety of Indian dishes, offering a delicious combination of savory and aromatic notes that satisfy the palate.
Has Gluten
Vegetarian
Desserts & Beverages
Gulab Jamun
...gulab jamun is a quintessential Indian dessert, consisting of deep-fried dough balls soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup flavored with rose water, cardamom, and saffron. These golden brown delights are soft, spongy, and incredibly indulgent, offering a delightful burst of sweetness in every bite.
Vegetarian
Has Nuts
Rasamalai
...rasamalai is a decadent Indian dessert, consisting of soft, creamy cheese dumplings soaked in sweetened, saffron-infused milk. Garnished with slivered nuts and fragrant cardamom, each bite offers a luxurious blend of textures and flavors, making it a delightful treat that's cherished in both traditional feasts and celebrations.
Vegetarian
Has Nuts
Carrot Halwa
...carrot halwa, also known as "gajar ka halwa," is a sumptuous Indian dessert made from grated carrots, simmered in ghee, milk, sugar, and flavored with cardamom and nuts. Slow-cooked to perfection, it boasts a luscious texture and delightful sweetness, making it a beloved treat for special occasions and festivals.
Vegetarian
Has Nuts
Mango Kulfi
...mango kulfi is a decadent frozen dessert originating from India, featuring the luscious sweetness of ripe mangoes combined with rich, creamy milk. Infused with cardamom and saffron, it offers a burst of tropical flavor in every velvety bite. This indulgent treat is a delightful way to cool off on hot days.
Vegetarian
Malai Kulfi
...malai kulfi is a decadent Indian frozen dessert, renowned for its rich and creamy texture. Made from thickened milk, flavored with cardamom, saffron, and nuts, it is churned to perfection and frozen in molds. Indulgently sweet, kulfi delights with every creamy bite, offering a taste of traditional Indian decadence.
Vegetarian
Chickoo Kulfi
...chickoo kulfi is a luscious frozen dessert originating from India. Made with ripe chickoo (sapodilla) fruit, creamy milk, sugar, and flavored with aromatic cardamom, this kulfi offers a delightful combination of creamy texture and sweet, tropical flavor. It's a refreshing treat enjoyed by all ages, especially during hot summer days.

Topped with a scoop of velvety vanilla ice cream, this classic Indian dessert is perfect for cooling off and satisfying your sweet cravings. Served chilled, each spoonful offers a refreshing burst of floral notes, balanced with a hint of sweetness and a chewy texture—making it an irresistible treat!

Dhaba
Indian
Kitchen
Est. 2014
At Dhaba Indian Kitchen, we bring the heart and soul of the traditional roadside "dhaba" to your plate. We offer mouth-watering Punjabi (North Indian) cuisine made with only the highest quality, hand-ground Indian spices, and the freshest ingredients. Our team of traditional Punjabi chefs, with over 60 years of combined culinary experience, is passionate about delivering the fantastic flavors of India in every dish.

Cashew Stuffed Paneer Kebab(4 Pcs)

$7.99

Broccoli Cheese Balls (4)

Entrée
In Indian cuisine, "curry" generally refers to a dish featuring a sauce or gravy, often with vegetables, or tofu, seasoned with a blend of spices and herbs

$13.99

$16.99

Paneer Tikka Masala
$16.99
Paneer Tikka Masala is a popular Indian curry where cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese), onions and peppers are marinated with yogurt and spices, grilled with Basmati Rice Complementary

$13.99
Yellow dal, also known as yellow lentils, is a versatile and nutritious staple in Indian cuisine with Basmati White Rice
Palak Daal
$14.99

Chana Pindi
$13.99

$13.99
A simple and healthy curry recipe prepared mainly with a choice of vegetable with Basmati White Rice complementary

							be added on a party of five or more
INDIAN CURRIES
For Centuries spices have been used to make curries. 
							There are hundred of different types of curries 
							depending on the geographic location of India you 
							are in. Curries apart from giving a sharp 
							distinctive
N
ew Delhi flavour 
							are also foods for health. Every spice used in their 
							making has some antiseptic medicinal value and money 
							are known carminatives and rich in vitamins. The key 
							process of making curry involves carefully adding 
							each herbs and spice at the right time. This helps 
							to bring out the unique taste while retaining the 
							maximum nutritional value.
At new Delhi we take special pride in preparing each 
							curry dish to taste with varying degrees of hotness. 
							As our patrons wish. So please enjoy trying the many 
							fresh curry dishes our menu and know each has been 
							cooked especially for you enjoyment.

Nutrition
Nutrition Facts
At Golden Corral
®
, we take pride in serving our guests a variety of fresh, high-quality foods that meet their nutrition goals. Search our menu database for nutrition facts to help plan your next meal at Golden Corral.
Allergen Statement
Diet-Friendly Options
At Golden Corral, we support the freedom to eat what you love, or quite possibly, what you need. From meat and potatoes to plant-based diets, our buffet of almost 150 items accommodates almost every nutrition plan, helping you stay within your health goals and leave feeling satisfied with your meal.

Allergen Statement
Our buffet offerings change frequently and may use ingredients containing common food allergens such as peanuts and other tree nuts, seafood including shellfish, whey, wheat/gluten, eggs, dairy, soy, and sesame. If you have any questions about ingredients, please ask to speak with a restaurant manager. However, because of the handcrafted nature of our menu items, the variety of procedures used in our kitchens and grills, our reliance on our suppliers, and the self-service nature of our buffets, we cannot guarantee the accuracy of ingredient information. The possibility that an ingredient might be transferred among food items and must disclaim any liability regarding the accuracy of such information.
Cage-Free Shell Egg Commitment
As of March 2025, Golden Corral has achieved its stated goal of sourcing only shell eggs that are cage-free for all locations.

Lance Trenary began his restaurant career in his father’s restaurant at a young age, where he learned the value of guests and the people who serve them. Lance joined Golden Corral in 1986 as Partner Manager. After deciding to pursue a multiunit career with Golden Corral, he quickly rose through the system, holding leadership roles of increasing responsibility. He was named President and Chief Executive Officer in January 2015, leading America’s largest buffet and grill concept and becoming only the third person to hold this position in the brand’s 49-year history. This year marks Lance’s 36th year with Golden Corral.
Lance’s industry leadership includes his current role as Chair of the Board of Directors for the National Restaurant Association, as well as serving as a Trustee for the National Restaurant Association Educational Foundation. Lance also serves on the Executive Committee of the North Carolina Restaurant and Lodging Association and is a former Chair (2016). He has chaired the Restaurant Industry Executive Council and served as a WFF CEO Advisory Council member.
Lance was the 2022 recipient of the highest honor in the restaurant industry, the IFMA Gold and Silver Plate Awards. In 2019, Lance was named the Restaurateur of the Year by NCRLA and was a past recipient of the Griff and June Glover Award for Distinguished Service. In addition, Lance was the recipient of the 2019 Chairman’s Award for the National Restaurant Association Educational Foundation and was the National Restaurant Association’s 2020 Chairman’s Award recipient for outstanding leadership and contributions to the industry. He has also been named to the Society of Fellows of the Culinary Institute of America.
Committed to giving back, Lance served as a founding board member for Camp Corral, a summer camp for children of wounded or fallen military service members, and chaired the board in 2019. Lance also serves on the Founder’s Circle Advisory Board for Project Healing Waters, which is dedicated to physically and emotionally rehabilitating wounded or disabled military service personnel. He was honored by that organization with the Patriot Award for a lifelong commitment to our military veterans. In addition, he is a passionate supporter of ProStart for the National Restaurant Association Educational Foundation. He contributes time and resources to help young people explore career opportunities in the industry he loves. He makes supporting the development of the future leaders of the restaurant industry a personal priority.
Lance and his wife of 37 years, Paulette, have two adult daughters, Elizabeth and Ally-Catherine.
JIM LAVERTY
CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
Jim has been part of the Golden Corral family for over 41 years. In 2014, Jim was appointed Senior Vice President of Finance and Administration of Golden Corral and GC Cares. In his current role as the Chief Financial Officer of Golden Corral Corporation, Jim directs the Accounting and IT Departments and is responsible for the protection of the financial assets of the company, coordination of the company’s budget, financial forecasting for the strategic plan and maintaining the company’s records.
Jim graduated with a B.S. in Accounting from Penn State University in 1979.
He is an avid golfer and sports enthusiasts as well as an active member of his church family. Making their home in Cary, NC, Jim and his wife enjoy spending time with their children and their spouses as well as their grandchildren.
SHELLEY WOLFORD
CHIEF PEOPLE OFFICER
Shelley Wolford has worked in the hospitality industry for 30 years. She joined the extended leadership team at Golden Corral Corporation twelve years ago, first as Vice President of National Marketing for six years, before moving into a senior leadership role as Senior Vice President of Strategy & Communications. Shelley’s role later expanded to Chief People Officer, which includes leadership responsibility for Human Resources, while retaining her strategy and communications responsibilities.
Shelley also dedicates time to advancing meaningful industry causes through her roles as past Chair and Board Trustee for the North Carolina Restaurant & Lodging Association Foundation, Advisory Board member for the Multicultural Foodservice & Hospitality Alliance, and Executive Steering Committee member for the Prosper Forum. In addition, she was appointed to the North Carolina Education and Workforce Innovation Commission to join educators and community leaders to ensure that the state has an effective and efficient workforce development system that meets the current and future needs of workers and businesses.
Shelley received her B.S. in Hotel and Food Administration from Boston University and an MBA from Georgetown University.
PAUL “SKIP” HANKE
CHIEF MARKETING OFFICER
Skip Hanke joined Golden Corral Corporation as Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) in 2021. Skip is responsible for Golden Corral’s National Marketing, Advertising, and Media Plan, as well as its Local Store Marketing and Off-Premise Business.  As CMO, Skip is also responsible for Food & Beverage / Culinary Innovation, Guest Insights, and Purchasing.
As a 4th Generation U.S.Navy Veteran, Skip achieved the rank of Lieutenant as a United States Naval Officer.
Skip holds both a BA in Economics with distinction from Duke University (cum laude) and a Masters of Business Administration (MBA) with distinction from Northwestern University’s J.L. Kellogg Graduate School of Management.  An avid golfer and sports fan, he lives in Cary, North Carolina.
DAVID CONKLIN
CHIEF DEVELOPMENT OFFICER
David Conklin has worked in the hospitality industry for over 22 years.  He joined the Golden Corral Senior Leadership Team 8 years ago, first as the Senior Vice President of Development before being promoted to Chief Development Officer.  David leads our efforts for Company Growth and Brand Expansion, Innovation and Remodels.  He is responsible for Franchise Development, Real Estate, Construction and Coastal Equipment – Golden Corral’s equipment company.   He also dedicates time to the expansion of the hospitality industry and increasing visibility of the industry as a career path by supporting the East Carolina University School of Hospitality Leadership as an Advisory Board Member.
David received his both his B.A. in Legal Studies, and J.D. from the State University of New York at Buffalo.   He lives in the Raleigh, North Carolina area with his family.
CHAPPELL PHILLIPS
EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT / GENERAL COUNSEL & SECRETARY
Chappell Phillips is the Executive Vice President, General Counsel & Secretary of Golden Corral Corporation, leading the company’s Legal Department and overseeing all legal aspects of key strategic activities. He has been a member of the Senior Leadership Team since 2017, first as Senior Vice President before being promoted to Executive Vice President in 2021. He has also served as an officer of GC Cares since its inception in 2017. Prior to joining Golden Corral in 2013 as Assistant General Counsel, Chappell spent 18 years practicing in-house at various companies, including 11 years with Kimball International, a global manufacturer based in Indiana.
Chappell enjoys actively advocating for the interests of the restaurant industry as a member of the Board of Directors of the Restaurant Law Center, serving as Chairman from 2020 through 2022.
A native Tar Heel, Chappell received a BA in Latin American Studies and JD from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Chappell is licensed to practice law in North Carolina. He and his wife Elaine live in Hillsborough, NC and have seven children and a dog Luna. Outside of work he enjoys time with family and church friends, playing pickleball, tennis, and basketball, and attending UNC basketball games.

About the Business
We serve authentic variety of Chinese
dumplings, noodles and some
signature street food. We make
everything in house fresh and tasty.
Our dumplings are handmade and
noodles are produced in the morning
everyday. Our soup broth are slow
cooked for 8 hours daily. We hope you
can experience most authentic
Chinese northeastern food in town!
…
Read more

I'm not sure if GF options are offered

Q:
Do you use MSG in any of your food?
A:
There is no MSG in our noodles and dumplings, however some sauces on side from our sauce provider may contains.

name: Wing Hong Restaurant
raw_text:
Menu | Wing Hong Restaurant
Wing Hong Restaurant
Email
RSS
Home
Gallery
Menu
Wing Hong Restaurant
Search
Menu
Wing Hong Restaurant is a delightful dining destination that offers an authentic American Dim Sum experience and a fusion of classic Chinese dishes. Located in a quaint strip mall, this family-owned restaurant has been in operation for over 50 years, serving delicious, fresh, and generously portioned food to its loyal patrons.

The restaurant's menu is a unique combination of old-school Michigan Chinese dishes, such as Almond Chicken and Sweet and Sour Pork, alongside a wide variety of dim sum options and classic Cantonese dishes. Wing Hong's dim sum, served from carts that allow customers to visually select their choices, has been compared to the best dim sum shops in San Francisco and Windsor, Canada.

Aside from its mouthwatering cuisine, Wing Hong is known for its friendly and attentive staff who are eager to assist customers with their selections. The welcoming atmosphere and excellent customer service are just some of the reasons why people keep coming back.
Hours
Mon-Thu		11:00 am - 10:30 pm
Fri-Sat	11:00 am - 12:00 am
Sun	12:00 pm - 10:00 pm

name: AhHa Noodles
raw_text:
AhHa Noodles
About Us
Gallery
Menu
News & Events
Contact
Login
AhHa Noodles serves authentic Chinese Noodle Bowls and Rice Bowls (Poke). The food is great! Don't take our word for it, check out the many great reviews that we get online. Come in and enjoy a fresh quick meal!
Menu / Order
37700 6 Mile Rd Suite 385 Livonia, MI 48152-3925
Northern China Food
China is a large country where the different regions have distinct cooking styles. Ah-Ha! Noodles focuses on the favorite of Northern China – NOODLES!
Sep 20, 2023
We are Open Again!
We are open again! Sorry about needing to take a day off. Hope to see you soon!
Read more...
Our hearty noodle dishes are rapidly prepared with fresh ingredients for a quick rounded meal.
These dishes are designed for the harsh cold winters of Northern China. They feature rich, bold, and salty flavors. Our noodles range from the thicker wheat Udon noodles to thin rice vermicelli noodles. In addition to noodles, we have other Northern favorites such as dumplings and wontons.
Menu
Noodles are not only amusing but delicious.
Julia Child
Located in the Laurel Park Place Mall near the Phoenix Theatres
Ah-Ha! Noodles
is Now Open
The long-awaited opening has finally come! We opened our doors for business on November 1st, 2018. Special thanks to everyone that helped make our fist day a great success. We look forward to seeing you more often.
We are conveniently located at the entrance to the Laurel Park Place mall across the street from Phoenix Theatres. This is a great place for a quick meal before a movie or on lunch break. The parking structure across the street allows you to park and walk in a covered area to the restaurant.
Come and check out one of the newest restaurants in town for a well rounded meal!
About Us
A NEW authentic Chinese noodle restaurant using fresh ingredients served in a timely fashion!

+1 734 892 0741

Kamayan which translates to "by hand" refers to the traditional Pinoy style of eating -
