name: Thai Vylai
raw_text:
Thai Vylai
MENU
DIRECTION
PROMOTIONS
CONTACT
Menu
Thai Vylai offers the best selection and variety of Thai food in the greater Detroit area.  Party trays and catering also available.  Please call us for more information and prices.
Appetizers
[A1] Spring Roll (1pc)
Seasoned vegetables and transparent noodle wrapped in rice paper, deep-fried to a crisp golden hue served with Plum sauce.
[A2] Satay (4pcs)
Chicken breast marinated in flavorful Thai curry and coconut milk on a skewer, grilled and served with savory Peanut sauce.
[A3] Tofu Tod (8pcs)
Tofu fried to a crisp, served with creamy Peanut sauce.
[A4] Crab Wonton (5pcs)
Wonton wrap filled with seasoned cream cheese and imitation crabmeat, deep-fried to a crisp served with Plum sauce.
[A5] Crispy Roll (6pcs)
Seasoned minced chicken, transparent noodle, bean sprout and carrot wrapped in rice paper, deep-fried to a crisp served with sweet House sauce.
[A6] Chicken Wing (6pcs)
Chicken wings fried golden brown served marinated in sweet Chili sauce.
Soups
All soups come with choice of tofu, chicken, or shrimp.
[S1] Tom Yum (Famous Thai Soup)
Mushroom, bamboo, tomato and onions in flavorsome lemon-lime and chili paste broth.
[S2] Tom Kha Gai (A Must Try)
Mushroom, bamboo, tomato and cilantro in lemon-lime and creamy coconut broth.
[S3] Thai Veggie Soup
Assorted fresh vegetables in a flavorful clear broth.
Salad
[SA1] A-Roy Salad (House Special)
Lettuce, cucumber, tomato, carrot and cilantro tossed with roasted onion and roasted garlic flavored with tasty House dressing.
[SA2] Thai Salad
Lettuce, cucumber, tomato, bean sprout and fried tofu topped with savory Peanut dressing.
[SA3] Apple Salad
Green apple tossed with chicken, shrimp, green onion, cashew and roasted coconut flakes in delightful House dressing.
[SA4] Larb (Lettuce Wrap)
Minced chicken tossed with cilantro, green onion, lemon grass, kaffir leaves, and roasted rice in a tangy Thai dressing served with lettuce.
[SA5] Yum Nur
Beefsteak slices tossed with lettuce, cucumber, tomato and onions in special Thai Vinaigrette.
Traditional Entree
All entrees come with choice of veggie, tofu, chicken, pork, shrimp, scallop, squid, or beef and served with a side of white rice. Traditional Entree lunch portions are available between 11:00 am and 3:00 pm.
[E1] Pa Prik
Bell pepper, onion, bamboo shoot and mushroom stir-fried in flavorful Oyster sauce.
[E2] Pa Pak
Broccoli, mushroom, napa, peapod, carrot and baby corn stir-fried in a delectable Oyster sauce.
[E3] Pa Baigraprow
Bell pepper, broccoli and peapod stir-fried in tasty basil Oyster sauce.
[E4] Pa Almond or Cashew
Almond or Cashew nut, celery, bamboo shoot, mushroom, onions, and water chestnut stir-fried in delicious Oyster sauce.
[E5] Pa Khing
Carrot, mushroom, celery and water chestnut stir-fried in tasty Ginger Oyster sauce.
[E6] Pa Kow Pode
Baby corn, napa, mushroom and peapod stir-fried in a fresh Light sauce.
[E7] Pa Kra Tium
Celery, green onion and water chestnut stir-fried in garlicky Pepper Oyster sauce served over lettuce.
[E8] Pra Ram Long Song
Steam broccoli topped with buttery Peanut sauce.
[E9] Pa Preaw Warn
Pineapple, cucumber, tomato, green pepper, and white onion stir-fried in a Sweet & Sour sauce.
[E10] String Bean
String bean sauteed in flavorsome Garlic-Ginger sauce
Curry Entree
All curry entrees come with choice of veggie, tofu, chicken, pork, shrimp, scallop, squid, or beef and served with a side of white rice. Curry Entree lunch portions are available between 11:00 am and 3:00 pm.
[C1] Pa Ped
Eggplant, white onion, bell pepper, and mushroom in delicious creamy Curry.
[C2] Pa Prik Khing
String bean sauteed in delicious Thai Red Curry.
[C3] Gang Kew Warn (Green Curry)
Green pea and bell pepper in coconut Green Curry.
[C4] Pineapple Curry
Pineapple and bell pepper stir-fried in rich Curry.
[C5] Gang Masaman (Yellow Curry)
Peanut, potato, carrot and onion stir-fried in flavorful Yellow Curry.
[C6] Gang Pa Nang (Red Curry)
Bell pepper stir-fried in coconut Red Curry topped with aromatic kaffir leaf.
[C7] Gang Gai
Mushroom, bamboo strip and bell pepper in tasty milky Curry.
[C8] Gang Ped Dang
Eggplant, bamboo shoot, carrot and broccoli in delicious Thai Basil Curry.
[C9] Peanut Curry
Bamboo strip, baby corn and water chestnut in flavorsome Peanut Curry.
Fried Rice
All fried rice come with choice of veggie, tofu, chicken, pork, shrimp, scallop, squid, or beef.
[FR1] Kow Pa (Famous Thai-Style)
Fried rice with egg, onions, green pea and carrot.
[FR2] Kow Pa Curry
Curry fried rice with egg, onions and bamboo strip.
[FR3] Pinapple Kow Pa
Fried rice with pineapple, egg, onions, and carrot.
[FR4] Kow Pa Baigraprow
Fried rice with basil, egg, onions, string bean, and bell pepper.
[FR5] Thai Vylai Kow Pa
Fried rice with chicken & shrimp, egg, onions, carrot, bean sprout, spinach and broccoli in Chef's special sauce.
Noodle
All noodles come with choice of veggie, tofu, chicken, pork, shrimp, scallop, squid, or beef.
[N1] Pa Thai (Thailand's Most Famous Dish)
Rice noodle, egg, bean sprout and green onion sauteed in flavorful Pad Thai sauce served with TOPPING of crushed peanut, cabbage and a wedge of lemon.
[N2] Curry Noodle
Rice noodle, egg, bean sprout and green onion sauteed in special Curry sauce served with TOPPING.
[N3] Pa Se-Ewe
Wide rice noodle, egg, bean sprout and broccoli sauteed in Se-Ewe sauce.
[N4] Mee Khoua
Egg noodle fried to a crisp topped with peapod, carrot, green onion and bean sprout in garlic Oyster sauce.
[N5] Pa Wonsin
Transparent noodle with egg, bean sprout, broccoli and tomato sauteed in special Wonsin sauce.
[N6] Drunken Noodle
Wide rice noodle with egg, basil, onion and bell pepper sauteed in Drunken Noodle sauce.
Poultry
All poultry entrees are served with a side of white rice.
[P1] Bangkok Orange Chicken
Lightly breaded chicken in House Orange Oyster sauce.
[P2] Bangkok Sesame Chicken
Lightly breaded chicken in Chef's special Sweet & Sour sauce with roasted sesame seeds sprinkled on top.
[P3] Curry Chicken
Lightly breaded chicken topped with broccoli, mushroom, napa, peapod, carrot and baby corn stir-fried in mouthwatering Curry.
[P4] Thai Framed Duck
BBQ duck stir-fried with baby corn, mushroom, broccoli, water chestnut, bamboo shoot and carrot in delectable Thai Vylai Oyster sauce.
[P5] Curry Duck
BBQ duck stir-fried with bell pepper, onion, green pea and pineapple in creamy coconut Curry.
Seafood
Fish entrees come with choice of Tilapia or Catfish. All seafood entrees are served with a side of white rice.
[SF1] Pla Tod
Lightly breaded fish fillet fried to a crisp topped with onions and bell pepper in garlicky Oyster sauce.
[SF2] Pla Pre Warn
Lightly breaded fish fillet fried to a crisp topped with bell pepper, white onion, cucumber and tomato in special Sweet & Sour sauce.
[SF3] Pla Duke Pad Ped
Lightly breaded fish fillet fried to a crisp topped with bamboo shoot, bell pepper and eggplant stir-fried in a flavor-packed Curry sauce.
[SF4] Pla Jien
Lightly breaded fish fillet fried to a crisp topped with shredded pork, shrimp, mushroom and green onion in House Ginger sauce.
[SF5] Curry Shrimp
Shrimp stir-fried in coconut Curry served with a ring of broccoli topped with aromatic kaffir leaf.
[SF6] Shrimp Delight
Shrimp stir-fried with water chestnut, bell pepper, bamboo shoot and carrot in Chef's special Oyster sauce.
[SF7] Pa Pao Tak
Combination of shrimp, scallop, imitation crabmeat, peapod, water chestnut, bamboo shoot and bell pepper in sweet Oyster sauce.
[SF8] Pa Talay
Combination of shrimp, imitation crabmeat, squid, bamboo shoot, bell pepper and mushroom in delightful Curry.
[SF9] Thai Vylai Seafood Combo
Combination of lightly breaded fish fillet fried to a crisp, shrimp, scallop, squid, imitation crabmeat, broccoli, celery, mushroom, peapod, water chestnut, carrot and baby corn stir-fried in our sweet & tangy House sauce.
Thai Vylai, Inc
6555 Allen Rd
Allen Park, MI  48101

About the Business
Rooted in our deep background and passion for Chinese food, we wanted to fill the gap for authentic dishes in Madison Heights. Our noodles are handmade and pulled before being dropped into a rich, warming meat broth that's made to order every day. With us, you never have to settle for anything less than fresh ingredients at an affordable price. Expand your culinary range with our variety of flavors -- from spicy, garlic noodles to chive dumplings that melt in your mouth, our homemade dishes will always leave you coming back for more. Head on over and taste the passion we put into our culture and cooking.
…

Where We Started
Our Story
Paradise Chop Suey Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine in Detroit, MI. Paradise Chop Suey's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for eat-in or take-out meals in the Detroit community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

What our customers say
Reviews
I love this place it's been and forever a little hidden gem. They have lunch specials and the food is always good. The staff is always pleasant. Try them you won't regret it.
Rachel Wilson
Had lunch with my sister from here today. The food is still as delicious as ever! This place is still my favorite Chinese restaurant. The place is clean and the food is just delicious!
Dorotha Nelson
I'm 36 years old and I've been going to this place since I was a little girl and their food has been the same. I love the pepper steak and shrimp fried rice and the gravy is the best!
Travon T.
This is probably my favorite Chinese food in the area. The Chop Suey is the best, the vegetables are always fresh, and they're super fast. I highly recommend this place.
Alexis M.
I always come here whenever I'm in the area. Their food is always amazing and really enjoyable. The staff is also very nice and polite. A must-try for Chinese food lovers.
Denmark G.
Paradise Chop Suey is one of our favorite restaurants in the area. This is the only place where we order Chinese food. We never had a bad experience from them.
Leovic C.

These cookies allow the Controller’s web application to remember choices you make while browsing and/or using the application (such as your user name, language or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features.
These cookies can also be used to remember changes you have made to text size, language and other parts of web pages that you can customize.
The information these cookies collect will not personally identify you, and they cannot track your browsing activity on non Controller’s websites.

Where We Started
Our Story
Tokyo Sushi & Grill Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Japanese and Thai cuisine in Royal Oak, MI. Tokyo Sushi & Grill's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for eat-in or take-out meals in the Royal Oak community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

View Full Menu
What our customers say
Reviews
Excellent, friendly service. The food was very good too. I didn’t want rice with my sashimi lunch and they gladly substituted a salad. Sashimi was very fresh and tasted great.
Joe Hakim
We've been here twice now and haven't been disappointed! We were seated immediately and the service was excellent. Even more than that, the food is absolutely amazing!
Melodee Hayward-Wruck
We were seated and served immediately. Our server was polite and fast. The food was delicious and not too expensive. I would recommend this place over other sushi places.
Duncan Gilbert
This is a great little spot. Good sushi and fair prices. We had a great dinner. If you just want a great meal prepared by very kind people running a family business, then come here.
Katie Kaz
Amazing! My husband and I love it here. The sushi quality is amazing and the price is ridiculously low for the amount of food you get. 10/10. Also, the owners are so attentive and sweet.
Jordan Jay
Super yummy and the people are very nice and service oriented. I came in late but they were willing to fulfill my late take out order for a self indulgent sushi dinner. Will be returning!
Jessica Nathan

The information these cookies collect will not personally identify you, and they cannot track your browsing activity on non Controller’s websites.

Michigan’s Premier Asian Bistro
Savor our Shogun Special Roll, Hibachi Chicken, and Vegetable Tempura, crafted fresh for lunch and dinner. Customers love our vibrant sushi and teppanyaki shows, serving St. Clair Shores, Warren, and Roseville. About Shogun
I’m thrilled to welcome you to Shogun, with locations in St. Clair Shores, Macomb, and Sterling Heights. We serve dishes like Rainbow Roll, Teriyaki Chicken, and Miso Soup, all made with care. Customers rave about our fresh ingredients and lively atmosphere, earning us a great reputation. Enjoy our Japanese and Chinese specialties through convenient takeout or delivery!

Thai Ocha Plymouth Menu
Home
Menu
Welcome to
Thai Ocha Plymouth
, a culinary haven nestled in the heart of Plymouth, Michigan. This vibrant eatery specializes in authentic Thai cuisine, offering a menu that bursts with flavor and creativity. From the moment you step in, expect a warm ambiance and the tantalizing aroma of spices.
Highlights include their signature
Tomyum soup
, a spicy and sour delight featuring fresh herbs and choice of protein, along with the creamy
Tom Kha
, balancing coconut milk with zesty lime. For rice lovers, the
Kow Pad
selections shine, especially the popular fried rice prepared with fresh veggies and your choice of meat.
Spicy curry enthusiasts will fall in love with dishes like the
Red Curry
and
Green Curry
, both expertly crafted with vibrant ingredients. At Thai Ocha Plymouth, every dish tells a story, inviting you to savor the essence of Thailand right in Michigan.

Q:
What are the prices for buffet?
A:
30 dollars per person is $24 and then they charge you a service fee depending on how many guests you have. Make sure you tip so that you can get good service because you won't if you don't give them a tip on top of the service fee.

Where We Started
Our Story
Sizzle It Asian Bistro Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine in Novi, MI. Sizzle It Asian Bistro's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for dine-in or take-out meals in the Novi community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

What our customers say
Reviews
I had the chicken and steak sizzle it with the savory garlic sauce. Delicious flavor, friendly staff, and good service. One of my favorite Asian meals now.
Steve Wayne
The food was amazing. Had the steak sizzle it with added spinach and broccoli. Hubby has a lunch bento box with General Tso's Chicken. I recommend this place to everyone.
Lilli S.
Extremely satisfied customer. Fast, friendly service, delicious food and they even delivered to the campground we were staying at. We will definitely be back for more.
Mary Kientz
My roommate and I make the 45-minute drive from Shelby Township nearly every weekend for lunch. The quality of the food is outstanding, the staff is incredibly friendly.
Jonathan Karsh
Phenomenal food. Some of the best Asian food in this area. The honey chicken had a rich, full flavor. You could actually tell you got the right meal. Great flavor and really fresh.
Brandon Goldberg
We really had a great experience. I ordered the Shrimp Sizzle It with various toppings and my wife ordered General Tso's Chicken. Great flavor, came out excellent.
Brian King

Mandarin Dine-In Service
Please visit the
Locations
page of the Location you wish to visit to confirm hours of operation. Reservations are highly recommended. Please phone your nearest
location
directly for more information and/or to make a reservation.
Children ages 12 years old and under must be accompanied by an adult.
Buffet
Mandarin Buffet
is an all-you-can-enjoy dine-in experience offering over 100 dishes on our buffet tables.
Kids ages 4 and under eat Free from the Buffet
(up to two kids per paid adult).
Our Dine-In Selection has Something Delicious for Everyone
Thai Mango Salad
Salads & Chilled Seafood
Choose from a number of our fresh and delicious salads like Thai Mango Salad or Kiwi Mussels!
Wonton Soup
Soups
Try our savoury soups, a tasty complement to your meal.
Mandarin Classics
Mandarin Classics
Enjoy a selection of your favourite Chinese-Canadian dishes including Breaded Torpedo Shrimp, Beef with Broccoli, General Tao Chicken, Barbecued Spareribs, and Sweet & Sour Pork.
Vegetable Fried Rice
Noodles & Rice
Try our signature noodles and rice dishes. Selections include Shanghai Noodles, Singapore Noodles, Vegetable Fried Rice, and more!
Grilled Rib Eye Steak
Grill & Teppanyaki
Savour deliciously seasoned meats and fried dumplings from our Grill.
Vegetable Roll
Sushi
Delight in our wide variety of sushi freshly made by our Sushi Chefs.
Pepperoni Pizza
Pizza
Get a little slice of heaven with every bite of our classic oven-baked pizzas.
Mini Waffle with Blueberry Topping and Ice Cream
Desserts
Satisfy your sweet-tooth! Delicious dessert selections include Crème Brûlée, pies such as Chocolate Cream Pie, Coconut Pie, Lemon Meringue Pie, Waffles and more!
* Subject to availability. Selection may vary daily and by Location.
For Your Safety and Comfort
We ensure that your Mandarin experience will be enjoyable as well as safe and comfortable for you and your family. Disposable gloves and sanitizer are also available for customers. Safety measures have been taken to ensure the health and safety of our customers and employees.
For more information:
• Please call your nearest
location
.
Increased Sanitization
More rigorous cleaning and disinfecting of all surfaces inside the restaurants. Additional hand sanitizer stations have been implemented. More frequent changing of buffet utensils.
Team Safety Measures
Staff are fully trained in health and safety procedures, and can work with masks inside the restaurant if they choose.

Mandarin
Accessibility Statement
Accessibility Statement
www.mandarinrestaurant.com
October 9, 2025
Compliance status
We firmly believe that the internet should be available and accessible to anyone, and are committed to providing a website that is accessible to the widest possible audience,
regardless of circumstance and ability.
To fulfill this, we aim to adhere as strictly as possible to the World Wide Web Consortium’s (W3C) Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1 (WCAG 2.1) at the AA level.
These guidelines explain how to make web content accessible to people with a wide array of disabilities. Complying with those guidelines helps us ensure that the website is accessible
to all people: blind people, people with motor impairments, visual impairment, cognitive disabilities, and more.
This website utilizes various technologies that are meant to make it as accessible as possible at all times. We utilize an accessibility interface that allows persons with specific
disabilities to adjust the website’s UI (user interface) and design it to their personal needs.
Additionally, the website utilizes an AI-based application that runs in the background and optimizes its accessibility level constantly. This application remediates the website’s HTML,
adapts Its functionality and behavior for screen-readers used by the blind users, and for keyboard functions used by individuals with motor impairments.
If you’ve found a malfunction or have ideas for improvement, we’ll be happy to hear from you. You can reach out to the website’s operators by using the following email
Screen-reader and keyboard navigation
Our website implements the ARIA attributes (Accessible Rich Internet Applications) technique, alongside various different behavioral changes, to ensure blind users visiting with
screen-readers are able to read, comprehend, and enjoy the website’s functions. As soon as a user with a screen-reader enters your site, they immediately receive
a prompt to enter the Screen-Reader Profile so they can browse and operate your site effectively. Here’s how our website covers some of the most important screen-reader requirements,
alongside console screenshots of code examples:
Screen-reader optimization:
we run a background process that learns the website’s components from top to bottom, to ensure ongoing compliance even when updating the website.
	In this process, we provide screen-readers with meaningful data using the ARIA set of attributes. For example, we provide accurate form labels;
	descriptions for actionable icons (social media icons, search icons, cart icons, etc.); validation guidance for form inputs; element roles such as buttons, menus, modal dialogues (popups),
	and others. Additionally, the background process scans all of the website’s images and provides an accurate and meaningful image-object-recognition-based description as an ALT (alternate text) tag
	for images that are not described. It will also extract texts that are embedded within the image, using an OCR (optical character recognition) technology.
	To turn on screen-reader adjustments at any time, users need only to press the Alt+1 keyboard combination. Screen-reader users also get automatic announcements to turn the Screen-reader mode on
	as soon as they enter the website.
These adjustments are compatible with all popular screen readers, including JAWS and NVDA.
Keyboard navigation optimization:
The background process also adjusts the website’s HTML, and adds various behaviors using JavaScript code to make the website operable by the keyboard. This includes the ability to navigate the website using the Tab and Shift+Tab keys, operate dropdowns with the arrow keys, close them with Esc, trigger buttons and links using the Enter key, navigate between radio and checkbox elements using the arrow keys, and fill them in with the Spacebar or Enter key.Additionally, keyboard users will find quick-navigation and content-skip menus, available at any time by clicking Alt+1, or as the first elements of the site while navigating with the keyboard. The background process also handles triggered popups by moving the keyboard focus towards them as soon as they appear, and not allow the focus drift outside of it.
Users can also use shortcuts such as “M” (menus), “H” (headings), “F” (forms), “B” (buttons), and “G” (graphics) to jump to specific elements.
Disability profiles supported in our website
Epilepsy Safe Mode:
this profile enables people with epilepsy to use the website safely by eliminating the risk of seizures that result from flashing or blinking animations and risky color combinations.
Visually Impaired Mode:
this mode adjusts the website for the convenience of users with visual impairments such as Degrading Eyesight, Tunnel Vision, Cataract, Glaucoma, and others.
Cognitive Disability Mode:
this mode provides different assistive options to help users with cognitive impairments such as Dyslexia, Autism, CVA, and others, to focus on the essential elements of the website more easily.
ADHD Friendly Mode:
this mode helps users with ADHD and Neurodevelopmental disorders to read, browse, and focus on the main website elements more easily while significantly reducing distractions.
Blindness Mode:
this mode configures the website to be compatible with screen-readers such as JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver, and TalkBack. A screen-reader is software for blind users that is installed on a  computer and smartphone, and websites must be compatible with it.
Keyboard Navigation Profile (Motor-Impaired):
this profile enables motor-impaired persons to operate the website using the keyboard Tab, Shift+Tab, and the Enter keys. Users can also use shortcuts such as “M” (menus), “H” (headings), “F” (forms), “B” (buttons), and “G” (graphics) to jump to specific elements.
Additional UI, design, and readability adjustments
Font adjustments –
users, can increase and decrease its size, change its family (type), adjust the spacing, alignment, line height, and more.
Color adjustments –
users can select various color contrast profiles such as light, dark, inverted, and monochrome. Additionally, users can swap color schemes of titles, texts, and backgrounds, with over 7 different coloring options.
Animations –
epileptic users can stop all running animations with the click of a button. Animations controlled by the interface include videos, GIFs, and CSS flashing transitions.
Content highlighting –
users can choose to emphasize important elements such as links and titles. They can also choose to highlight focused or hovered elements only.
Audio muting –
users with hearing devices may experience headaches or other issues due to automatic audio playing. This option lets users mute the entire website instantly.
Cognitive disorders –
we utilize a search engine that is linked to Wikipedia and Wiktionary, allowing people with cognitive disorders to decipher meanings of phrases, initials, slang, and others.
Additional functions –
we provide users the option to change cursor color and size, use a printing mode, enable a virtual keyboard, and many other functions.
Browser and assistive technology compatibility
We aim to support the widest array of browsers and assistive technologies as possible, so our users can choose the best fitting tools for them, with as few limitations as possible. Therefore, we have worked very hard to be able to support all major systems that comprise over 95% of the user market share including Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Apple Safari, Opera and Microsoft Edge, JAWS and NVDA (screen readers), both for Windows and for MAC users.
Notes, comments, and feedback
Despite our very best efforts to allow anybody to adjust the website to their needs, there may still be pages or sections that are not fully accessible, are in the process of becoming accessible, or are lacking an adequate technological solution to make them accessible. Still, we are continually improving our accessibility, adding, updating and improving its options and features, and developing and adopting new technologies. All this is meant to reach the optimal level of accessibility, following technological advancements. For any assistance, please reach out to

About
Our chefs specialize in authentic and delicious Thai food. The staff at Sy Thai Shores is devoted to serving customers mouthwatering dishes that feature the highest quality ingredients available. Sesame Chicken, Sy's Chicken Dinner and Ka Prow are all prepared quickly and delivered to you right away.
Sy Thai Shores uses only the freshest ingredients around, ensuring that every dish is of the highest possible quality. Not sure what you're in the mood for? Try one of our specialties including Pad Pak , Cashew Nut, Thai Peanut, Pad Khing, and more.

Apple L.
Business Owner
Bai Mai Thai, we are committed to bring the freshness and deliciousness through our food along with the safety of our guests. Throughout these past weeks, Bai Mai Thai has been following the safety and prevention code and protocol of Coronavirus. Due to this difficult time, Bai Mai Thai may lack of some supplies or ingredients. So, we will be out of stock in some items in which will be changing daily depending on what we have available. I hope our guests would understand us. We also has to change the operating hour. Please visit our Bai Mai Thai Facebook for any update.

About the Business
Welcome to Prime Thai, where we bring the authentic flavors and spices of Thailand right to your table. Our menu features a variety of traditional Thai dishes, from fragrant curries and spicy stir- fires to fresh and flavorful salads. Our chefs use only the freshest ingredients and traditional cooking techniques to ensure that each dish is bursting with the bold and vibrant flavors that Thai cuisine is known for.

Whether you're a fan of classic dishes like Pad Thai and Green curry, or you're looking to try something new and exciting, we have something for everyone. Our restaurant offers a warm and inviting atmosphere, prefect for enjoying a delicious meal with friends and family.

Come and experience the taste of Thailand at our new restaurant. We can't wait to serve you
…

name: Ajishin
raw_text:
Ajishin Menu: Discover Delicious Sushi and Udon Delights in Novi
Ajishin
Toggle navigation
Ajishin
Home
About
Menu
Locations
Reviews
Contact
Discover
Ajishin Menu
Home
Menu
Welcome to Ajishin, a delightful Japanese eatery located in Novi, MI, specializing in sushi and noodles. The menu offers a vibrant selection of
Udon
and
Soba
noodles, inviting you to savor unique flavors. Starting with their udon, you can't miss the
Kiyomizu
—a simple yet satisfying bowl, or the
Kangetsu
, featuring a perfectly poached egg that elevates the soup. For soba lovers,
Kitashirakawa
brings a refreshing taste with grated radish, while the
Nishijin
boasts the luxury of shrimp and vegetable tempura. Beyond the delicious dishes, Ajishin prides itself on being casual and family-friendly, offering takeout, reservations, and vegan options. Whether you're looking to enjoy a lunch with friends or a relaxed dinner, this culinary gem caters to everyone. With a welcoming atmosphere and attentive service, Ajishin sets the stage for a memorable dining experience.

Spice Up Your Meal Adventure

Savor Thai Delights
Step into a world of vibrant flavors from the comfort of your home with Bangkok Station Thai Restaurant. About
Our chefs specialize in authentic and delicious Thai food. The staff at Sawasdee Thai Restaurant is devoted to serving customers mouthwatering dishes that feature the highest quality ingredients available. Pad Pak Curry, Peanut Curry and Pad Pak are all prepared quickly and delivered to you right away.
Sawasdee Thai Restaurant uses only the freshest ingredients around, ensuring that every dish is of the highest possible quality. Not sure what you're in the mood for? Try one of our specialties including Gang Keaw Warn , Pad Cashew Nut, Potato Curry, Gang Ped, and more.

SWEET AND SOUR CHICKEN

raw_text:
APPETIZERS
Pung Nakoong	         $5.25
bread topped with ground shrimp and seseme seed then deep fried and served with plum sauce
Tofu Tod	         $4.50
deep fried bean curd served with peanut sauce
Chicken Satay (4)	         $7.50
skewered chicken tender marinade in curry and coconut milk served with peanut sauce
Crab Rangoons (2)	         $2.50
imitation crab meat with onion, green onion, cream cheese, and mayannaise wrapped in a wonton skin
Spring Roll (2)	         $2.50
vegetarian spring roll in thai style served with plum sauce
Giew Tod (6)	         $3.95
crispy wonton with marinaded chicken inside served with plum sauce
Nong Tong (6)	         $4.50
Crispy chicken wings marinade in Thai special sauce served with plum sauce
Fried Chicken Cake(7)	         $5.50
ground chicken mixed with potatoes, in special sauce. deep fried to golden and served with special plum sauce
Chicken Lettuce Wraps	         $7.50
Chopped chicken, wok with shiitake mushroom, water chestnut, and green onion in special dark brown sauce topped with crispy rice noodle
SOUP
Tom Yum
the most famous thai hot and sour soup clear soup with mushroom, tomatoes, green onion, coriander and herbs
Shrimp, Squid ..................... $3.95
Chicken, Tofu, Vegetable .............. $3.50
Gai Tom Kha
hot and sour soup with mushroom, tomatoes, green onion, coriander and herbs in savory coconut milk broth
Shrimp, Squid ..................... $3.95
Chicken, Tofu, Vegetable .............. $3.50
THAI SALAD
Yum Neau	         $13.50
sliced barbeque beef with lettuce, cucumber, tomato, red-green onion, celery, coriander, chili pepper and lime juice
Yum Pla Muge	         $13.50
squid with lettuce tomatoes, red onion, green onion, coriander, chili pepper and lime juice
Larb	         $13.50
choice of ground chicken, ground beef, ground pork mixed with lime juice, red-green onion, coriander, crushed dried and cracked roasted rice served with fresh lettuce on side
Yum Ka-lum-plee	         $13.50
salad with sliced cabbage, red-green onion, tomatoes, ground peanut, chili pepper and lime juice
Yum Ta-le	         $13.50
shrimp, squid with lettuce, tomatoes, red onion, green onion, coriander, chili pepper and lime juice
Yum Koong	         $13.50
shrimp with lettuce, tomatoes, red onion, green onion, coriander, chili pepper and lime juice
Yum Von Sen	         $13.50
shrimp, ground pork, slice black mushroom, red onion, celery, coriander, chili pepper and lime juice
Nam Sod (chicken, Beef, Pork)	         $13.50
choice of ground chicken, ground beef, ground pork mixed with lime juice, fresh sliced ginger, roasted peanut, red-green onion, coriander, crushed dried served with fresh lettuce on side
THAI CURRY
Gang Gai
stewed in with red hot curry, bamboo shoot. egg plant, string bean, bell pepper, baby corn and coconut milk
Shrimp, Squid, (lunch / Dinner) (/ $12.25) .......................... $8.95
Chicken, Beef, Pork, Tofu Or Vegetable (lunch / Dinner) (/ $11.25) ...... $7.95
Gang Mus Sa Mun

This place is tasty and decently-priced. We initially started getting from here because our Pho place is pretty far, however I found a new dish that I absolutely love! Their Firecracker Chicken is sooo good! It comes with white rice. (Spring rolls sold separately) I look forward to trying other new dishes as well.
— Brittany, Local Guide
I was so excited to try ‘The Takeout Box” and, they did not disappoint! I ordered the Hmong Sausage, Pad Thai, Spring Rolls, a Spicy Chicken dish. There was also Chicken Satay…Thank You😀.. Let me tell you, everything was delicious. I will be returning!
— Stacey Burch

Just used Wok To You’s delivery service for the very first time to get Thai food from
Bangkok Cuisine 3
in Roseville. Process by phone went smooth as silk and my food was delivered within 30 minutes which was a half hour sooner than what I was told. Driver was very nice. Highly recommend!
(
Google Review
)
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Fraevo10
Testimonials
In my 27 years of life this is the very first review I have ever left on Google. I have used wok to you for years and have always been very pleased. This night in particular I was left absolutely flabbergasted by the incredible and kind service that I received. I spoke to a very nice gentleman on the phone who took the time to help us pick out a Chinese restaurant in our usual range (since ours is under new ownership and not what it used to be and we have not found one that we enjoy thus far), and he was incredibly kind and patient on the phone(plus we LOVE the place he recommended!!!!!!!!) After, we had the absolute sweetest delivery driver deliver our food and had a pleasant short conversation with her! So so nice all around! Wok to you has SUCH nice staff always. I will always continue to use wok to you because I have never had a bad experience and this night was no exception! P.s. always tip your drivers!
(
Google Review
)

About the Business
Welcome to Little Saigon
Located conveniently in Troy , MI 48083 , Little Saigon 2 Express is a famous address for Vietnamese food.   We strive on providing the best experience and we cater to all. The Freshness of our product is the key to our success. We offer a variety of delectable fresh dishes, fine food prepared to your exacting standards, and superb service. We are shaping the way people experience life. We have the courage to create experiences that go beyond our guests’ expectations.  At Little Saigon 2 Express , in addition to providing delicious food, we always welcome customers with a friendly serving attitude and professional style so as to bring customers the best impression. Hygiene and food safety is the top priority in our restaurant. We only use fresh and healthy food as well as clean items to make customers feel the most comfortable, believe and assign their meal to us.   Come with us and enjoy the best food . Little Saigon 2 Express awaits you and your family .

and

Adobo
~ Our popular Philippine entree of chicken, pork, onions, and Philippino seasonings simmered together to make a delightful stew.  Served with a side of rice.  $16.95

~ A delicious seafood medley of fresh mussels, shrimp, king crab, succulent scallop, and baby squid, simmered with tomatoes, onions, garlic, and bell peppers in a seafood tomato broth.  Served with a side of rice.  $24.95

~ A delicious blend of marinated beef, garlic, onions and potatoes. Sauteed in a sweet brown sauce and served with a side of rice.  $16.95

Where We Started
Our Story
Golden Phoenix Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese and Thai cuisine in West Bloomfield Township, MI. Golden Phoenix's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for eat-in or take-out meals in the West Bloomfield Township community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

View Full Menu
What our customers say
Reviews
The almond chicken is excellent! I also enjoy the egg rolls and the staff is friendly and helpful. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for great, reasonably priced Chinese cuisine in the West Bloomfield area.
Kevin Laverty
Absolutely loved our dinner here! Everything was hot and fresh. From the soup and egg rolls to the beautiful almond chicken and chicken broccoli everything was fresh and delicious!  We had a wonderful time.
K Savitksy
Golden Phoenix is top notch. I have tried many different places over the years and none really compare to Golden Phoenix in terms of taste, price, and service. You cannot go wrong eating at this restaurant.
John Talor
The food was delicious. Ordered egg rolls, chicken chop sure, pork fried rice and Thai honey chicken extra spicy. My husband loves spicy food and this was the first time he didn't add any extra heat.
Marsha F.
Our go-to place Christmas day for a carryout. Even though this is their busiest day of the year, they are very organized and the order is always accurate. Food is delicious and the portions are huge. Good job!
Wendy F.
We ordered ahead on a Saturday afternoon. Food was ready when we arrived and the gentleman that handed us the order was very polite. But best of all, the food was wonderful...fresh and delicious!!
Steven H.

raw_text:
Menus – Savannah Blue Detroit
Close
Order Online
Reservations
Menus
Catering
Gallery
Location
Gift Cards
Menus
Taste the Essence of Detroit - Savor Our Contemporary Northern Soul Food with a Southern Twist
What to know before you go
Restaurant's terms and conditions
Proper Attire Required!
SavannahBlue was stylishly designed to provide an upscale dining "experience" for our diverse clientele.
NO illegal substances on premises.
No outside food or beverages like a cake.
No balloons.
No hats or hoods indoors.
No Hoodies.
No casual athletic (gym) clothing.
No clothing that is overly revealing; this includes spandex clothing.
No see-through clothing.
No overpowering perfumes, cologne or offensive odors.
A gratuity of 20% will be applied to all checks
Parties of 5 and over will incur a 22% gratuity
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness
VO- vegetarian/vegan option. It may require modifications to the item
Hours
Tuesday - Thursday: 5PM - 10PM
Friday & Saturday: 4PM-11PM
Sunday: 3PM-8PM
About
Dress Code
Location
1431 Times Square
Detroit, MI 48226
313-926-0783
© 2025 SAVANNAHBLUE  ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
Dear Valued Guest:
We Maintain A “Proper Attire” Policy At SavannahBlue. SavannahBlue Was Stylishly Designed To Provide An Upscale Dining “Experience” For Our Diverse Clientele. While We Want You To Be Comfortable, Our Attire Policy Is Designed To Ensure That ALL Our Guests Are Comfortable And Are Afforded The Enjoyable Experience They Deserve.
We Ask Our Male Guests To Refrain From Wearing Sleeveless Shirts And Casual Athletic (Gym) Clothes. We Also Have A Strictly Enforced “No Hat” Policy In The Restaurant For Men.
We Consider Our Restaurant Family Friendly And Therefore Ask Both Males And Females To Avoid Wearing Clothing That Is Overly Revealing. This Includes Some Spandex Clothing. In Addition, Please By Mindful And Respectful Of Others With Regard To Overpowering Colognes Or Scents.
We Understand Our “Proper Attire” Standard Is Somewhat Subjective, However We Believe That Good Judgement Will Avoid Most Issues.
Thank You For Your Cooperation And ENJOY YOUR DINING EXPERIENCE.

About
/ The Craft Grille
Offering award-winning, student-made beer to the public.
Explore our draft list.
View Our Menu
Student-Made
Award-Winning
Great Variety
The Craft Grille
The Craft Grille features an upscale pub-style menu, award-winning craft beer created by our own Brewing & Distillation Technology program, and a selection of wines and craft mocktails. Enjoy watching your favorite sporting events, live games and more while seated at the bar or in our dining room. Our 3 flagship beers, Kolsch-Style, Haggerty IPA and College Pale Ale, are available on tap as well as a rotation of seasonal offerings. Beers to-go are available for purchase in 4-pack 16 oz. cans, growlers, howlers and crowlers.
View Our Menu

About Us
FAMILYÂ OWNEDÂ SINCEÂ 1968
Founded by Paul and Peter Gogo in 1968, Mr. Paul's Chophouse has been serving traditional steaks and seafood for over 50 years. Paul and his brother Peter saw an opportunity for a steakhouse restaurant in the middle of Roseville, Michigan's automotive industrial area.
Their dream and vision, is now being carried on by Mr. Paul's six children. Â Paul Jr., Chris, and Peter run Mr. Paul's Chophouse while Nancy, Garry, and Wayne take care of business at the Brewery Restaurant (This is Mr. Paul's second restaurant, founded in 1980) The family is continuing the exquisite service that keeps friends and clients coming back.
Tradition
GREATÂ SERVICE. FRESHÂ INGREDIENTS.
Great emphasis is placed on service and USDA prime beef and fresh seafood, both of which are delivered fresh twice a day.

About the Business
Avenue Grill is a family-owned, 24/7 restaurant located in the heart of Detroit. We serve homemade American comfort food, breakfast all day, and crowd favorites like our famous chicken Caesar wrap, burger sliders, and loaded nachos. Whether you're starting your morning or grabbing a late-night bite, we’re here with fresh ingredients, fast service, and real flavor. What sets us apart? We're open around the clock, we treat every customer like family, and our food speaks for itself.

L.A. Bistro opened its doors in 2001 and is family owned and operated. Located on Michigan Avenue in downtown West Dearborn, Samir Johair and his three sons, opened Dearborn’s first Italian bistro serving Halal meat.  L.A. Bistro recently expanded into a new facility and is rated Dearborn’s #1 Italian restaurant.

Frita Gear
We strive to source our meat, cheese and produce from Michigan or the Midwest whenever possible. This is an ongoing quest and something personally meaningful to us, so if you have a favorite local, humane farm or purveyor, please point us in their direction. It will be greatly appreciated! All of our chicken and beef is certified Halal! Please come visit us to learn about our seasonal specials!

About the Business
Zo's Good Burger is a fast-growing, Michigan-based burger joint that started as a humble operation inside a local gas station--fueled by flavor, family, and the voices of our customers. Born from the minds of three brothers with a craving for better Halal burgers, we set out to flip the script on fast food by focusing on freshness, customization, and bold, city-style flavor. Every patty is crafted with the perfect fat-to-meat ratio, every topping is a deliberate choice, and every order is a chance for our guests to create their version of the perfect burger. What started as a simple idea has grown into a multi-location experience built around quality, community, and the pursuit of burger greatness. This is Good Done Gooder
…

Food
Snacks
Large Soft Pretzel
Large soft pretzel lightly dusted with salt, baked until hot. Served with our house-made beer cheese - $13
Wings
1lb of fresh chicken wings fried then tossed in your choice of - Kung Pao, Buffalo or Mike's Dry Rub - $15
Baked Cheese Dip
4 cheese dip baked in a cast iron skillet, gremolata, side of toasted baguette - $14
Steak Tips
Marinated tenderloin tips, red wine reduction, carmelized onion, blue cheese crumble - $17
Poutine
French fries, house-made brown gravy, cheese curds & herbs - $13
Loaded Fries
Bacon, sour cream, chives, house-made beer cheese
Truffle Fries
Parmesan, parsley, black truffle mayo - $13
Soups and Salads
Mediterranean Chopped Salad
Mixed greens, grape tomato, red onion,  chick peas, cucumber, kalamata olives, feta,  lemon sumac vinaigrette, za’atar bread - $15
Daily Soups
Offering Tomato Basil or Soup of the Day - cup or bowl.
House Salad
Mixed greens, grape tomato, cucumber, red onion, croutons, house-made vinaigrette - $10   Add: steak, shrimp or chicken for upcharge
Chicken Caesar
Chopped romaine, grilled chicken, parm, crouton, house-made Caesar dressing. Sub steak or shrimp for upcharge - $14
Entrees
Shrimp Tacos
Three warm tortillas, seasoned shrimp, mango pico, red cabbage slaw, lime crema, tortilla chips w/ house-made roasted tomato salsa - $18
Bayou Shrimp Pasta
Seasoned shrimp, sliced andouille sausage, sautéed red pepper and onion, creole-style sauce, parmesan, scallion - $18
Steak Frites
Creekstone Black Angus sirloin marinated in Founder's Red Rye IPA, garlic and Moroccan spices. Served with fries & zip sauce - $24
Bánh Mì Bowl
Rice, crispy pork belly, sweet hoisin sauce, cucumber, jalapeño, cilantro, pickled carrots, radish, sriracha aioli - $19
Sandwiches
Rustic Caprese
Melted fontina, basil pesto vinaigrette, roasted tomatoes, mixed greens, red onion, sciacciatta bread - $15
Jerk Pulled Pork
Pulled pork, house-made jerk marinade, red cabbage slaw, pineapple, rustic Italian bread - $16
Chicken Chipotle
Pulled chicken, smoked gouda and mozzarella, grilled onion, pico de gallo, honey-chipotle mayo, rustic Italian bread - $16
The Fire'Bird'
Our twist on a Cordon Bleu - breaded chicken breast, Swiss cheese, smoked ham, tomato, arugula and truffle mayo on brioche with fries - $16
Diner Burger
Two smashed patties, american cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickle, special sauce, brioche bun, fries. (Plant based patties available) - $17
Philly Cheesesteak
Shaved sirloin, onions, green peppers and house-made beer cheese on a real Amoroso bun - just like in Philly. Served with fries - $17
Dessert

About the Business
Business owner information
Sean P.
Business Owner
Willis Show Bar, in Detroit's Historic Cass Corridor, is a classic cocktail bar & live music venue. First opening in 1949, it was a hot spot jazz club until it closed its doors in 1978. The legendary bar lives again in its original Art Moderne style with a floorplan that captures the attention of every seat in the house. The very unique main stage is set behind the bar and features amazing live music and sometimes cabaret performers & deejays. Our focus is on amazing cocktails, top notch service and a fun time for all.

About the Business
Business owner information
Hassan M.
Business Owner
Born in Detroit and raised in the Metro Detroit area, Chef Hassan Musselmani's extensive culinary background and passion for food started as a young man in his family's kitchen.

Working in the culinary world since the age of 13, Hassan has continued to gain knowledge and experience that would lead to his opening of several Metro Detroit venues and to his being an integral part of the accomplishments of many popular local restaurants .

Chef Hassan grew up on very deep Middle Eastern- and Detroit-styled American cooking, and it is his dream to create a fresh local menu that is inspired by these roots.

Chef Hassan Musselmani was one of 18 aspiring chefs that braved Gordon Ramsay and his fury on Season 15 of HELL'S KITCHEN. Chef Hassan and the Drunken Rooster Food truck will also be featured on Chopped the reality TV cooking show.

TRIA’s Contemporary American Cuisine Restaurant Menu Highlights Local Flavors and Ingredients
Are you looking for a restaurant with a fine dining American cuisine menu that regularly features elements taken from foods around the world? Look no further than TRIA – Inspired American Cuisine. Serving fine dining and American
cuisine in Dearborn, MI
, TRIA serves unique entrees and one-of-a-kind cocktails made by our world-class chef and talented bartenders. On average our customers have rated their dining experience, 4.4 out of 5 based on 381 ratings.
Make Reservations
Click on any menu item to view the price and an image of it!
One of the biggest compliments TRIA receives is for our fine dining restaurant menu that features fresh flavors and locally-sourced ingredients. Because the area of Dearborn is so diverse in population, our chef, Tim Enfield, has carefully cultivated a menu that features dishes from around the world. He also chooses local ingredients whenever possible, giving you a unique farm-to-fork adventure that’s enjoyable from the first to last bite. At TRIA, we believe there is no substitution for fresh!
For guests who require special diets, TRIA’s fine dining American cuisine menu currently offers more than 10 menu items that are gluten-free. As always, if you don’t see what you’re looking for, just ask and we’ll be pleased to accommodate you. We understand that some of our patrons have dietary restrictions, which is why we honor all requests. When you dine at TRIA, we keep it simple: Taste. Savor. Share.
Find Your Perfect Meal on TRIA’s Upscale Private Dining Menu
Are you looking for the perfect meal? Have you been dreaming about trying a certain type of cuisine? TRIA has a menu that appeals to a variety of palates. Some of the house specialties include dry-aged Angus sliders, dill-seared salmon, the Henry burger with farm egg and crisp pancetta, the Lake Superior whitefish taco, flatbreads, and smaller plates. With an incredibly diverse selection of mouthwatering choices, you’ll want to visit TRIA and try all the items on our fine dining
American cuisine menu
on a regular basis. Want an appetizer to start your meal off right? Try our house-pulled smoked mozzarella, paired with one of our fine wines or signature cocktails. Choose from over 35 varieties of wine, and enjoy your wine in multiple sized glasses — whether you want a single glass or an 8 oz. quartino to share. If a cocktail is more your style, we always feature craft cocktails — many of them feature combinations you may not have tried previously.
Have a Special Event? Consider One of Our Private Dining Rooms!
TRIA offers
private dining
spaces for up to 12 guests for a cozier, more personalized experience. You can order right from our menu, or customize your menu to fit your guests, theme or budget. The people you invite to TRIA will appreciate our fine dining American cuisine, and you’ll love the fact that you won’t have to clean up at the end of the meal. It’s the ideal way to celebrate a special occasion or gather together a group of friends or colleagues in Dearborn, MI.
Reserve Your Private Dining Room
Fresh and Local Food Restaurant in Dearborn, Michigan
When it comes to supporting your community, showing your appreciation for local businesses and making the most of what your area has to offer you, what you eat makes a difference.
When you go out for breakfast, meet friends or colleagues for lunch or spend an evening chatting with your loved ones over a delicious dinner, you want to pick the place you book your reservations carefully. Not only does choosing a local, independent eatery rather than a chain help your small and mid-sized local businesses thrive, but it also guarantees you’re eating fresher, healthier, more wholesome foods.
As a fresh and local food restaurant in Dearborn, MI, TRIA is a tasteful, fresh, flavorful dining option for every occasion.
TRIA: A Restaurant Serving Local Food in Dearborn, Michigan
Looking for advice on how to eat local and sustainable in Metro Detroit or wondering why local eating is so important? TRIA gives you all the benefits of local food with the unique flavor and preparation of an independent business. Here at TRIA, we believe in eating local, fresh foods to encourage sustainability and get the highest caliber of taste — we even shape our menu around seasonal local food.
Here are a few reasons why we love local food so much:
It’s Fresher and More Flavorful:
When you choose locally-grown food, that means it doesn’t have to be preserved and shipped across long distances, making the food riper, fresh and fuller in flavor.
It’s Healthier:
When food needs to be shipped across long distances and left in distribution centers before making it to the market or kitchen or ending up on your table, its nutrient supply decreases because the food is older. Fresher, locally-grown food has a much quicker transfer period from its source to your plate, meaning it retains its original nutrient content and is better for you to consume.
The Food Supply Is Safer:
Because locally-grown food doesn’t need to be shipped across the country and we know exactly where our food comes from, it’s exposed to fewer possible contaminants — and we can go straight to the source to ask exactly how they grew the food, so you can eat with confidence.
It Encourages You to Eat Seasonally:
Even though fruits and vegetables grow in their specific seasons, we use engineering to force them to grow off-season so we can eat them year-round. Locally-grown foods, however, only offer fresh, seasonal products, which taste better and are more nutritious.
It Supports the Local Economy:
Investing money in local food from farmers and growers supports our fellow community members and strengthens other area businesses since what we spend circulates locally.
It’s Good for the Environment:
Buying and eating local foods means we’re supporting and maintaining local farm spaces, avoiding preservatives and helping our local environment.
At TRIA, we serve unique, inspiring American cuisine using fresh, locally-grown ingredients from a seasonal menu. Because we believe in local food and sustainability, our menu and seasonal cuisine offerings are constantly changing to incorporate the fresh foods we can find nearby.
Wondering how to support your local business in Dearborn, Michigan, while eating fresh and healthy?
Plan your next meal out at TRIA
to savor our seasonal dishes with a local flair.

Our features
Bucharest Sticks
Our new sticks are available in Chicken, Beef or Quesadilla and are filled with some of the deliciousness that you have come to love from Bucharest. Give one a try or share a broken stick with a friend!
see menu
Shawarmas
Marinated & Grilled Chicken, Beef, Veggie or our signature Bucharest Shawarma have been the Detroiter's addiction since we opened our doors in 2007!  Many will agree that this is the best lunch under 5 bucks in the city!
see menu
House Specialties
Most come in for our signature shawarma but the enlightened Detroiter knows that the incredible recipes on this menu run deep! Now back on the menu are our Grape Leaves and Stuffed Pepper!
see menu
Salads
There's no shame in grabbing a quick salad!  For many, our portions are enough for two but it's the crisp veggies and unique flavors that make our salads popular.
see menu
Starters & Sides
They may not be the main event but they sure do enhance the Motor City Experience. Order a side to share and you have one tasty feast on your hands!
see menu

name: Beirut Bakery
raw_text:
menu
Home
Food
Our Menu
Catering
Dressings & Marinades
Ship Me Food
Wholesale
About
Our Story
Community Involvement
Location
Contact
Our
Menu
All of our recipes are created with love by the Hallis family. For generations, our family has created fresh, delicious food enhanced with the flavors of the Middle East, where our relatives were born. We grew up on these dishes; they bring us comfort. We hope they will for you, too.
= Vegan
= Gluten Free
Salads (Salata)
Tabouli
Finely chopped handpicked parsley mixed with fine bulgur wheat, minced Spanish onions, diced tomatoes and cucumbers, then soaked in BB's zesty dressing.
Fattoush
A chunky salad of English cucumbers, juicy tomatoes, chopped parsley, onions, and peppers served with toasted pita and BB's
Sitto's Fattoush Dressing
(also sold by the bottle)
. Chopped romaine lettuce upon request.
Wheat Salad
(Poor man's Tabouli) - Corse bulgur wheat soaked in tomato juice with minced Spanish onions, chopped parsley, and diced tomatoes in a lemony dressing.
Chickpea Salad
Whole chickpeas tossed with minced red peppers, chopped parsley, onions, and  garlic soaked in a lemony dressing.
Yogurt Salad
A refreshing, creamy plain yogurt with finely diced American cucumber topped with dried spearmint.
Cabbage Salad
Shredded green cabbage, diced Roma tomatoes and dry spearmint soaked in a lemony, garlicky vinaigrette.
Lentil Salad
Green lentil beans tossed with large orzo pasta, steamed carrots, minced red peppers, garlic, onions, and chopped parsley in our zesty vinaigrette dressing.
Chicken Fattoush
Romaine lettuce tossed with our fattoush salad and topped with BB's grilled tawook all white meat chicken breast. Served with salad dressing and toasted pita on the side.
Beef Fattoush
Romaine lettuce tossed with our fattoush salad and topped with BB's grilled and marinated tender tail beef. Served with salad dressing and toasted pita on the side.
Soups (Chorba)
Chicken Vegetable Soup
BB's traditional savory chicken broth with chunks of chicken, vermicelli noodles, orzo pasta, vegetables, herbs, and spices.
Crushed Lentil Soup
Red lentil beans purÃ©ed with Spanish onions, garlic, herbs, and spices.
Lentil Soup
Green lentil beans, red pepper, and Spanish onions in BB's traditional vegetable broth.
Roll Ups (Sandwichie)
Chicken Shawarma
Grilled all white meat chicken breast, pickled turnips, spiced onions, and cucumber pickles drizzled with tahini and a generous amount of BB's garlic sauce.
Beef Shawarma
Grilled tender tail beef, pickled turnips, spiced onions, tomatoes, parsley, and cucumber pickles with a dash of garlic sauce and generous portion of BB's tahini sauce.
Mjedara
BB's hearty mjedara and zesty cabbage salad.
Raw Kibbie
Available Fridays only
- BB's beef tartar, sliced onions, and olive oil.
Babalafil
Crispy falafel, pickled turnips, spiced onions, tomatoes, parsley, and  cucumber pickles with a dash of baba ghanouj and a generous amount of BB's Tahini sauce.
Tabouli & Hummus or Baba Ghanouj
BB's tabouli and your choice of garlicky hummus or smokey baba ghanouj.
Grape Leaves Meat & Hummus
BB's stuffed meat grape leaves and garlic hummus.
Veggie Shawarma
BB's garlicky hummus, pickled turnips, cucumber pickles, spiced onions, tomatoes, parsley, tahini, and garlic sauce.
Grape Leaves Vegetarian & Hummus
BB's stuffed vegetable grape leaves and garlic hummus.
Falafil Sandwich
Crispy falafel, pickled turnips, spiced onions, tomatoes, parsley, and cucumber pickles soaked with a generous amount of BB's Tahini sauce.
Labni
A classic Middle Eastern staple! Yogurt cheese spread, pitted Kalamata olives, diced tomatoes, and chopped romaine lettuce spiced with zaatar then drizzled with olive oil.
Chicken Fattoush Wrap
BB's fattoush salad, romaine lettuce, and grilled all white meat chicken breast drizzled with our own
Sitto's Fattoush Dressing
.
Kibbie Ball
BB's crispy kibbie crushed with garlicky hummus.
Breads
Bread (Khoubiz)
Available in Large 10/pk, Small 10/pk or Party 12/pk.
Whole Wheat
Available in Small 6/pk, Large 6/pk or Thick 6/pk.
Lavash
Available in 4/pk.
Baked Garlic Chips
Available per bag.
Home Cooking (Tabeekh)
Kibbie Ball
A crunchy shell of seasoned ground beef, lamb, and bulgur wheat stuffed with sautÃ©ed meat, onions, pine nuts and almonds, then deep fried in a vegetable oil.
Fool
A chunky blend of garbanzo beans and fava beans with lemon, garlic, and olive oil.
Green Beans
Italian style green beans fixed with diced Spanish onions and minced garlic in a chunky tomato sauce.
Kousa
A hollowed Italian squash stuffed with ground beef, lamb, and white rice in a bed of tomato sauce.
Vegetable Medley
A chunky stew of eggplant, yellow squash, zucchini, and Idaho potatoes fixed in a savory tomato sauce and garnished with chickpeas.
Mixed Greens
Steamed mustard, collard, kale, and spinach greens lightly salted in a lemony garlic sauce and topped with caramelized onions.
Mjedara
A mild blend of whole green lentil beans and white rice topped with crispy caramelized onions.
Raw Kibbie*
A Lebanese delicacy - Ground beef or lamb tartar kneaded and flavored with classic Middle Eastern spices and served chilled.
(Recommend with raw green onions and olive oil)
Grape Leaves Vegetarian
Seasoned white rice, Spanish onions, fava beans, chickpeas, and herbs and spices rolled in grape leaves and drizzled with olive oil.
Grape Leaves Meat
Seasoned white rice and ground meat rolled in grape leaves and topped with lemon juice.
Cabbage Rolls
Ground lean beef and lamb and white rice rolled in cabbage leaves and cooked with whole garlic cloves.
Bulgur Pilaf
Bulgur wheat with Spanish onions, green peppers, and garlic sautÃ©ed in a tomato purÃ©e.
Chicken and Rice
A blend of ground beef and lamb and white rice seasoned with sweet allspice and topped with shredded whole chicken, roasted pine nuts and slivered almonds.
Baked Kibbie
A thin crust of bulgur wheat, ground beef, and ground lamb stuffed with a hearty mixture of meat, onions, pine nuts, and almonds.
Rice Pilaf
White rice and roasted vermicelli noodles cooked in BB's chicken broth.
*Please note that consuming raw meats may increase your risk of foodborne illness.
Flat breads & Pies (Manoushie & Fatayer)
Spinach Pies
An oven baked thin crust stuffed with chopped baby spinach and Spanish onions, marinated in a tangy lemon dressing.
Falafil
A patty made of blended chickpeas, fava beans, onion, garlic, and sesame seeds and then fried in vegetable oil.
Chicken & Vegetable Pies
A thin crust stuffed with chunky chicken breast, diced potatoes, carrots, and peas.
Meat Pies
An oven baked thin crust stuffed with ground beef and lamb, diced Spanish onions, and spices.
Spheha
A thin crust stuffed with ground beef and lamb, minced Spanish onions, and chopped curly parsley in a tomato-green pepper purÃ©e.
Laham Bajeen
A thin, crispy flat bread topped with ground beef and lamb, minced Spanish onions, and chopped curly parsley in a tomato-green pepper purÃ©e.
Zaatar Bread
A soft, doughy flat bread topped with zaatar spice soaked in olive oil.
Cheese Bread
A soft, doughy flat bread topped with melted provolone and mozzarella cheeses.
Lebanese Pizza
A raised pizza dough topped with zaatar spice, a blend of mozzarella, provolone, and feta cheeses, black olives, and red and green peppers.
Spinach & Feta Cheese Pies
A flaky layered fillo dough stuffed with chopped baby spinach, creamy feta cheese, minced Spanish onions, and lemon juice.
Feta Cheese Pies
A thin crust stuffed with creamy domestic style feta cheese, chopped parsley, and minced Spanish onions.
Sauces & Dips (Mtabal)
Hummus
Chickpeas and tahini blended with garlic, lemon, salt, and oil.
Baba Ghanouj
Charbroiled eggplant and tahini blended with garlic, lemon, salt, and oil.
Classic Labna Dip
Yogurt cheese mixed with diced green onions, Spanish onions, herbs and topped with olive oil.
Spicy Labna Dip
Yogurt cheese mixed with diced green onions, Spanish onions, herbs, cayenne pepper and topped with olive oil.
Zaatar Labna Dip
Yogurt cheese mixed with our thyme, spice, sesame seeds topped with olive oil.
Garlic Dip
Garlic cloves whipped with oil, vinegar, egg whites, and salt.
Tahini
Lebanese tahini blended with lemon juice and salt.
Desserts (Helawiyaat)
Baklava Walnut
Layered golden brown fillo dough filled with crushed sugar coated walnuts topped with homemade syrup and finished with a sprinkle of pistachio (upon request).
Baklava Pistachio
Layered golden brown fillo dough filled with crushed sugar coated pistachio topped with homemade syrup and finished with a sprinkle of pistachio (upon request).
Mini Rose
Layered golden brown fillo dough filled with crushed sugar coated cashew topped with homemade syrup and finished with a sprinkle of pistachio (upon request)
Fingers
Layered golden brown fillo dough rolled with crushed sugar coated cashew topped with homemade syrup and finished with a sprinkle of pistachio (upon request).
Birds nest
Layered bed of fillo dough filled with sugar coated whole pistachio topped with homemade syrup and finished with a sprinkle of pistachio (upon request).
Dressings & Marinades
Sittoâs Fattoush Salad dressing
(also a great marinade) â A zesty blend of spices in a lemony garlicky vinaigrette.
House Dressing
(also a great marinade) â A zesty blend of spices in a lemony garlicky vinaigrette.
Chicken Shawarma / Tawook marinade
A blend of spices in a yogurt sauce.
Lamb/Beef Marinade
A blend of spices in a tahini sauce.
Seasonal Eats (Special order)
Please allow 3 days for preparation.
Vegetarian Cabbage Rolls
Potato Kibbie
Fried Cauliflower
Fried Eggplant
Potato Salad
Eggplant and Tomato

313-533-4422
Catering Menu
Having a party and want to serve the best middle eastern cuisine? View our catering menu options for finger foods, mezza, hot sides and party trays!
View catering Menu
Ship Me Food
Don't live in the area or the state but want to try our food? No problem! We'll carefully package a meal and ship it your way!
Ship Me Food
Buy Our Dressings
We sell bottles of our famous dressings. Sitto's Fattoush Salad Dressing, House Dressing, Chicken Shawarma/Tawook Marinade and our Lamb/Beef Marinade.

Cedarland Restaurant
This Lebanese mainstay features a ski chalet-inspired diner interior and a clever
								drive-thru window for takeout orders. Regulars love it for the complimentary lentil
								soup, juicy rotisserie chickens, and plentiful combination plates piled high with

Menu (Dearborn)
Menu (Dearborn)
Turkish Village Cuisine presents a menu that honors the rich traditions of Turkey, crafted with the finest ingredients and a passion for perfection. From flavorful mezzes to hearty mains. Each dish is a celebration of authentic flavors, inviting you to savor a culinary journey through the heart of Turkey.

Catering
Founded in 1998. Reimagined in 2024.
A Gem in the Heart of Hamtramck
ORDER ONLINE
A Family-Friendly Middle Eastern Dining Experience.
Discover unique flavors and great quality in a relaxed, contemporary environment.
Royal Kabob offers a diverse menu of authentic Middle Eastern cuisine, from kabobs to falafel, served in a welcoming and casual setting. The restaurant prides itself on using fresh ingredients and traditional recipes to deliver flavorful dishes that cater to a range of tastes. Visit us to experience a taste of the Middle East in every bite.
Craveable, unique flavors.
There’s something for everyone at our table
Royal Kabob is a Middle Eastern restaurant located in Hamtramck, Michigan, serving some of the best Arabic food in the Detroit Metro! A fantastic variety of authentic dishes along with Arab American fusion dishes guarantees a fabulous dining experience for the whole family. Take a look at what other diners are saying about
Royal Kabob on Yelp
...
View Menu
Catering Inquiries
WayToJannah - Local Guide · 300 reviews · 1,056 photos
6 years ago
Very good food, nice people and services. Have had shish tawook and lam galaba with salad. Everything was great, especially the appetizer. Bread and garlic paste were really good. I have been here several times, and every time was great. I do recommend this place to anyone.
Alexus Irizarry - 36 reviews · 52 photos
4 years ago
Kind people. The place was clean and welcoming. The food is delicious. Will go again. I had Lentil soup and Tomato Kibee.
Vershawn Hall - Local Guide · 64 reviews · 36 photos
4 years ago
All of this yumminess is only the half order. Fresh, juicy deboned chicken, veggies, rice, salad with bread, and THEE BEST garlic sauce ever. If you enjoy great food, you MUST HAVE Royal Kabob! They have wonderful and reasonable pricing and great lunch specials. This by far is my favorite restaurant in Hamtramck!!! Cute, clean, and cozy dine-in spot, or you can place an order to pick up!
Khair 313 - Local Guide · 124 reviews · 1,146 photos
6 years ago
Good food to go for big last-minute family gatherings :+1:
ATG “Aleksandr The Great” - Local Guide · 131 reviews · 118 photos
4 years ago
This place is amazing, has great food and very much of it.
Shaun Aneiros - Local Guide · 36 reviews · 13 photos
3 years ago
I love their garlic and pita bread for only a $1.00. It's great especially when you are broke! The service is fast and they are friendly. I'm going to try more things soon and update my review, but for now, I give them 5 stars!
Piper Meloche - Local Guide · 21 reviews · 8 photos
5 years ago
Excellent food, service, and staff. I had dinner here with my family tonight, and we were incredibly impressed with what we got. The garlic sauce is, no joke, the best I have ever had. We are getting a graduation party catered from here, and they have been so accommodating and helpful. Highly recommend.

            Update: The catering for my grad party could not have been better - they gave us more than enough food for a fair price, and all of my guests were over the moon about the meal. Hats off to y'all!!
Veronica Brumbaugh - Local Guide · 38 reviews · 69 photos
7 years ago
Loved everything. Eat all the food. Then eat more. Garlic sauce is killer. Best baba ghanoush of all time. Ever.
Kenyatta Smith - Local Guide · 71 reviews · 10 photos
6 years ago
One of my favorite spots. They have really good Mediterranean food. The food has great flavor and I love the garlic. They have carry out so you can call in your order or dine in. Oh yeah, they have vegetarian options as well. The vegetarian options are vegan-friendly as well.
Papa's Smokes - 5 reviews
7 years ago
First time ordering here last night, and the family really enjoyed their meal. The meals were big and hearty, filled us up. The food tasted fresh. I really enjoyed how much time they put into the salad, it was chopped, tossed, and dressed perfectly. The rice was one of the best rices that I've had for sure. This spot is definitely in our wheelhouse from now on!

            Oh yeah, the staff was super nice too...
Zinnu Ryne - Local Guide · 32 reviews · 74 photos
5 years ago
You can never go wrong here. The food is the best. Lamb chops are out of this world good! They are very consistent. We have enjoyed every visit. Deboned chicken, grilled chicken salad are other great items. The portions are huge; so if you are alone or a light eater, consider ordering half orders, but even that, I feel, is plenty! On top of what you order, you get welcomed with freshly baked bread (with toasted sesame seed) and garlic paste. It's so good that you just have to try to realize it!
Jonah Laursen - Local Guide · 67 reviews · 40 photos
7 years ago
Wonderful food with top-tier service. Cloth napkins, tablecloths, pita bread with dinner, and better service than you could expect in any chain restaurant anywhere. The food is phenomenal, and the portions are sizeable. The price of the food is very affordable, especially considering the quality, table service, and quantity. It's easy to get to, and there is a parking lot in the back, so you don't have to park on the street. It's open late and has takeout available as well. Honestly, my favorite restaurant in the Detroit area.
Joel Sass - Local Guide · 133 reviews · 118 photos
7 years ago
This is the real deal Mediterranean food in a real deal Mediterranean town. They serve this pita bread so hot that you need to be careful about immediately grabbing it because you could potentially burn yourself.

            The reason you would still consider grabbing the piping hot bread is because the garlic sauce, which was also placed on the table, has tantalizingly wafted its smell toward your face.

            "My god. They don't even charge for this? Are you kidding me?"

            Then comes the actual order. It's sublime. I've had good Mediterranean food, and this is some of the best.

            Finally, paying the bill. Dinner for two will probably cost under $25. A great bargain for some amazing food.
Rashara Biz - Local Guide · 37 reviews · 73 photos
5 years ago
Amazing food. This is some of the best Mediterranean food I've ever had. It was four of us, and we shared the deboned chicken platter for $20. The garlic sauce was fresh and tasty. This is a nice family restaurant where you can feed a family for cheap and be satisfied. When it comes to Mediterranean, you have to know how to cook it, and Royal Kabob does it right. Our waiter was nice and helpful.
Contact Us
313-872-9454
info@hroyalkabob.com
3236 Caniff Street,
Hamtramck, MI 48212

A Gem in the Heart of Hamtramck

A Family-Friendly Middle Eastern Dining Experience.
Discover unique flavors and great quality in a relaxed, contemporary environment.
Royal Kabob offers a diverse menu of authentic Middle Eastern cuisine, from kabobs to falafel, served in a welcoming and casual setting. The restaurant prides itself on using fresh ingredients and traditional recipes to deliver flavorful dishes that cater to a range of tastes. Visit us to experience a taste of the Middle East in every bite.

& char-broiled to perfection.Sheikh
Sheikh, also rendered as Sheik, Shaykh or Shaikh, is a word in the Arabic Language, which means elder of a tribe, lord, revered wise man, or Islamic
Scholar. The term literally means a man of old age, and it is used in that sense in Qur’anic Arabic. Later it came to be a title meaning leader, elder, or
noble, specially in the Arabian Peninsula, where Shaikh became a traditional title of a Bedouin tribal leader in recent centuries.
The title is not only used by Muslims; it is also used by Arab Christians for elder men of stature, showing that it is independent of religion. Its usage
and meaning is similar to the Latin senex meaning old man, from which the English “Senator” is derived. In the Persian Gulf States the title is used
for men of stature, whether they are managers in high posts, wealthy business owner, or local rulers.
In Lebanon, the title and its equivalent female form are commonly used when addressing members of the traditional Christian Feudal families such
Hobeiche (since 1515, ruled Ftouh Keerwan and the
city of Ghazir), El-Khazen (since 1545, ruled the Keserwan area and held the title of Consul of France), and El-Dahdah (since early XVIth Century,
also ruled certain areas of Keserwan). The Persian word “Shah” (King) is linguistically related to “Sheikh”.

A delicious offering that includes four shish kabob, four shish tawook, four shish kafta, four lamb chops, shawarma chicken and lamb mix, large order of hummus and baba ghanouj. Served with eight dinner salads or soups. Serves 8 people.

Privacy Policy & Returns
1
Privacy Policy
Before or at the time of collecting personal information, we will identify the purposes for which information is being collected.
​
We will collect and use of personal information solely with the objective of fulfilling those purposes specified by us and for other compatible purposes, unless we obtain the consent of the individual concerned or as required by law.
​
We will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfillment of those purposes.
​
We will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and, where appropriate, with the knowledge or consent of the individual concerned.
​
Personal data should be relevant to the purposes for which it is to be used, and, to the extent necessary for those purposes, should be accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
​
We will protect personal information by reasonable security safeguards against loss or theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
​
We will make readily available to customers information about our policies and practices relating to the management of personal information.
​
We are committed to conducting our business in accordance with these principles in order to ensure that the confidentiality of personal information is protected and maintained.
2
Returns
Original sales receipt must accompany returns. We accept returns for exchange or refund 24 hours after delivery of the product. At our sole discretion after 24 hours, we will offer an exchange or store credit only. Items must be in "new, unaltered and unused condition". Definition of new, unaltered and unused condition is:
• without showing signs of wear or damage in any way
• within 24 hours calendar days of the delivery date (after 24 hours no returns are allowed)
• must not be a special order or a custom order
• unless noted that it cannot be returned or has a different return policy time period other than that 24 hours noted in that item's particular item description.
If an item is received damaged or is incorrectly shipped by us please contact Customer Support immediately. Items that are defective and shipped from us or items that you did not order but received from us will qualify for store credit or a cash refund.
Refunds are contingent upon inspection of item(s) once we receive it.
There is a 15% restocking fee for returned items that are not being exchanged and are not damaged. Again you MUST contact us within 24 hours if you intend to return ANY item back to our store. Items returned to us AFTER 24 hours and WITHOUT contacting us, will NOT be refunded.
Customer is responsible for all shipping costs if seller is not at fault.
