MENU
All sandwich spreads and pestos are made in-house
Give us a call to find out our soups of the day!
Daily Creations
Spicy Green Beans and Tofu (Vegan)
Extra firm tofu and green beans, oven roasted with hot pepper flakes, garlic, and our special sauce
Spicy Sesame Noodles (Vegan)
Velvety, spicy noodles with toasted sesame seeds and garlic in a rich shoyu soy sauce.
Pesto Pasta
Elbow macaroni, basil pesto (made with walnuts), sundried tomatoes, Romano cheese
Roasted Carrots (Vegan)
Sweet organic carrots tossed in extra virgin olive oil, sea salt, and fresh ground pepper. Oven roasted then tossed with fresh chopped parsley and lemon juice.
Organic Hummus (Vegan & Gluten Free)
Organic garbanzo beans, organic garlic, sea salt, pepper, lemon juice and tahini.
Sandwiches
Mediterranean Baked Tofu (Vegan)
Baked tofu with mixed greens, roasted tomatoes, basil puree, romaine hearts, toasted pine nuts, red onion, caper mayo and olive mayo on multigrain bread.
Tofu Veggie (Vegan)
Baked tofu with herb veganaise, carrots, celery, onion, sprouts,
romaine hearts and tomato pesto on multigrain bread.
Tofu Reuben (Vegan)
Baked tofu with reuben mayo, spicy brown mustard, shredded cabbage, sauerkraut, carrot and caraway seeds on multigrain bread.
Hummus Veggie Wrap (Vegan)
Whole wheat lawash filled with Sprout House hummus, romaine, parsley, hot sauce, red onion, celery, carrot, tomato slices, and sprouts.
Southwestern Avocado (Vegan)
Cilantro puree, red onion, sun-dried tomatoes, avocado, romaine hearts, and chili mayo on sourdough bread.
Smoked Salmon
Dijon mustard, black pepper, red onion, smoked salmon, tomato slices,
romaine hearts and caper mayo on sourdough bread.
Tuna Salad
White & chunk light tuna mixed with canola mayonnaise, salt, pepper, carrots, celery, parsley, and red onion, topped with sprouts,
romaine lettuce, baby spinach, and tangy sumac spread on multigrain bread.
Cheddar Veggie (Vegetarian)
Shredded sharp white cheddar cheese, red onion, celery, carrots, sprouts, romaine hearts, herb mayo and tomato pesto on multigrain bread.
Cheesy Black Bean Burrito
Black beans, onion, garlic, tomato pesto, sharp white cheddar cheese, wrapped in a whole wheat lawash.
Salads
House Salad (Vegan and Gluten Free)
Mixed greens, carrots, sprouts, red onion, tomatoes
with Sprout House salad dressing on the side.
Quinoa Apple Almond Salad (Vegan and Gluten Free)
Organic quinoa with toasted almonds, golden
raisins, tart apples, and celery in agave
sweetened olive oil dressing
Mediterranean Quinoa Salad (Gluten Free)
Organic quinoa with feta, toasted pine nuts, cucumber,
kalamata olives, red onion, tomatoes, Sprout House Vinaigrette dressing.
Tempeh Salad (Vegan)
Tempeh, sweet dried cherries, chopped celery, salt, pepper, brown rice, bay leaves, tarragon, and red onion mixed together with veganaise.
Egg Salad (Vegetarian – NOT Gluten Free)
Free-range eggs, cubes of sourdough bread, red onion and
parsley, veganaise, dijon mustard., nutmeg.
Creamy Pea Salad (Vegan and Gluten Free)
Sweet peas, sliced leeks, grated nutmeg, a pinch of cayenne
pepper, parsley, Dijon mustard, veganaise.
Tuna Apple Pasta Salad (Gluten-free)
Tuna, quinoa pasta, apples, celery, red onion, currants,
veganaise, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, curry powder, garlic.

Hennessy V.S offers toasted and fruit notes, with a rich, clearly defined palate and a welcoming exuberance.
Hennessy V.S expresses its vibrant and dynamic personality through unique artist partnerships and annual limited editions. Easy to enjoy, it’s a perfect cognac for high-energy occasions and sharing the moment.

Experience buttery notes upon entry followed by sweet sugar cane, caramel, tobacco, leather, honey, and dark chocolate with elements of raisin and fig. This one changed the way we think of bourbon, all because one man changed the way he thought about making it. Bill Samuels, Sr., simply wanted a whisky he would enjoy drinking. Never bitter or sharp, Maker's Mark® is made with soft red winter wheat, instead of the usual rye, for a one-of-a-kind, full-flavored bourbon that's easy to drink. To ensure consistency, we rotate every barrel by hand and age our bourbon to taste, not time. Each and every bottle of Maker's® is still hand-dipped in our signature red wax at our distillery in Loretto, Ky., just like Bill, Sr., would have wanted.

Tasting Notes

AROMA: Sweet oak, vanilla, bright fruit and wheat prevail in the nose

This truly small-batch bourbon starts with traditionally grown corn, rye and malted barley. All of our staple grains are cultivated exclusively for us on the Omlin Family farm in Quincy, Washington. The grains are mashed, distilled, and barreled in our Woodinville® distillery, then trucked back over the Cascade Mountains to our private barrel houses, where Central Washington’s extreme temperature cycles promote the extraction of natural flavors from the oak. Prior to being coopered, the barrel wood is seasoned in open air, rain, wind, sun, and snow for eighteen months, softening the wood’s harsh tannins. Our menu is sourced locally and seasonally, with no freezer in house, everything is prepared fresh daily, made to you specifications.
Our Detroit location
Detroit
7greens is located at 1222 Library Street in the heart of Campus Martius in downtown Detroit’s central business district. We sit beneath the Z, a popular parking structure that is known for its public art murals by local and international artists.
healthy food
made to order…your way
salads | wraps | bowls
soup | smoothies | more
catering
events | meetings | party
Our chicken is grass fed, hormone and antibiotic free. We use brown, organic, cage-free eggs. Our sauces and dressings are paleo, keto-friendly, and gluten free. We only use natural sweeteners in all of our recipes.
We make homemade soup, bread and sweet treats daily. Be sure to check when ordering online or are picking up in the store what is fresh that day.
We offer seasonal drinks and sides to go along with your meal.

name: Miso
address: 817 E Big Beaver Rd, Troy, MI 48083
raw_text:
Miso - Japanese Restaurant｜Online Order｜Troy｜MI
Home
Gallery
Menu
Online Order
Contact Us
Select Page
Welcome to our restaurant! Come and try our dishes!
Online Order
Gallery
About Us
Miso is based in 817 E Big Beaver Rd, welcoming customers from all over Troy, MI and beyond.
We are a local Japanese restaurant inviting you to savor our amazing, fresh dishes and discover why we have so many delighted returning customers.
From Hibachi to Teriyaki and many mouth-watering Japanese dishes, you'll be sure to find many different flavors to try.
Experience the inviting ambiance of our lovely restaurant. For those on the go, we offer a convenient pick-up menu, allowing you to order and collect your food at your convenience.
We can't wait to welcome you.
Order Online Now
Stopped by for the first time, food, presentation, and service was awesome! What a gem in the heart of Troy! Their sushi pizza appetizer is delishhhh, pictured!
Amazing and delicious ! We love to eat here when we are in town. The sushi, ramen, tempura, agedashi tofu and hot sake are all wonderful and fairly priced. Try it out, you won't regret it!
Excellent food and service. My favorite is the crispy rice with salmon, just the right amount of sauce and crunch to the rice!!! Went with my company for celebration and it was a very enjoyable night. The service is amazingly spot on, we felt very welcomed and appreciated. Definitely 10/10 recommend to anyone who wants good sushi and a place to chill and chat with friends!!!
Went to Miso Troy for dinner last night...what a delightful experience!!
Great service, super clean space, and outstanding food!
We had the Spicy Garlic Edamame, Crispy Rice with Tuna, a Fancy Roll, and a Sweet Girl Roll.
Incredibly fresh and amazing flavor!!

Menus
Eat at some of the
best breakfast restaurants in Michigan
! Did we mention that we also serve brunch and lunch? Best of all,
Anna’s House
is inclusive of dietary needs and preferences, so everyone feels welcome.
Click here to print our current menus.
Menu Key
V
VEGETARIAN
VG
VEGAN
GF
GLUTEN-FREE
GFO
GLUTEN-FREE OPTION
*To enhance your dining experience and ensure your safety, kindly inform your server of any allergens you may have.
While we are not a gluten-free environment, items indicated “GF” have gluten free ingredients. Ask your server about menu items that are cooked to order or served raw. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.

Defined by elegant precision and a polished Mediterranean perspective, Forest serves contemporary Continental cuisine with Italian leanings in a sleek, glass-encased dining room that anchors a leafy residential neighborhood.
Continental Elegance
with an italian twist
MENU
RESERVATIONS
PRIVATE DINING
A breeding ground for world-class chef talent, Forest’s sophisticated soul is built on an exemplary kitchen developed and overseen by Chickpea Managing Partner Nick Janutol. Marrying Janutol’s Italian-American upbringing with fine-dining finesse gleaned from stints at some of the country’s finest restaurants, Forest is a study in understated simplicity at the highest level.
PHONE
(248) 258-9400
LOCATION
735 Forest Ave
Birmingham, MI 48009
HOURS
Tues–Thurs
5pm–10pm
Fri & Sat
5pm–11pm
Sun & Mon
Closed

Create your own Meal Suggestions
BBQ Lentil Club $8.25
Avocado, Spinach , Tomato, Onions, Peppers, & Mushrooms. On sprouted grain bread with
your choice of condiments (ketchup, mayo, relish, mustard). Add cheeze for $1?
Avocado Sandwich $5.50
Avocado, Spinach,Tomato, and Sunflower Seed Spread on sprouted grain bread.
Jamaican Jerk Vegetable Wrap $5.00
Seasonal vegetables sauteed in Jamaican Jerk seasonings. Add a patty for $2?
Black Bean Quesadilla OR Burrito $6.00
Black Beans, peppers, onions, mushrooms, choice of cheeze, herbs, and spices. Topped
with avocado.
Phish Tacos (3) $9.00
Phish Fillets, black beans, seasonal vegetables, peppers, onions, tomatoes, choice of
cheeze.
Green Goddess Griller $6.25
House-made Almond Pesto, Avocado, Spinach, and your choice of Vegan Cheeze.
Grilled to perfection.
Philly Cheeze Shroom $6.00
Thinly sliced shiitake mushrooms sauteed in steak sauce with onions and peppers, topped
with your choice of cheeze, wrapped in a spinach tortilla.
Fillet O' Phish $6.00
Vegan fish fillet (soy and gluten), house-made tartar sauce, and cheddar cheeze on sprouted
grain bread. Simple and delicious.
Fried Chik'n Sandwich $5.50
Housemade vegan chik'n (gluten), lettuce, and tomatoes.
Raw Veggies Wrap $6.00
Assorted Vegetables and Avocado, wrapped in a Nori (seaweed) wrap.
Macaroni Primavera with Chik'n Parmesan $13.00
Macaroni (made of brown rice, gluten free) sauteed with vegetables and smothered in
housemade pasta sauce. With a side of housemade chik'n (deliciously crispy wheat gluten
patty) topped with pasta sauce and cheeze.
Masala Platter Dinner $13.00 or Wrap $7.00
Lentils potatoes, and black rice sauteed with Masala seasonings.
Dinner includes vegetables, Wrap is wrapped in a spinach tortilla.
Fajita Platter $14.00
Seasonal vegetables, black beans, tomatoes, peppers, onions. Served with brown rice,
cheeze, avocado & tomato salad, and 3 corn tortillas.
Pineapple Fried Rice $11.00
Brown rice, vegetables, mushrooms, almonds, peppers, and onions tossed with our house-
made ginger pineapple sauce.
Coconut Curry Stir Fry $10.50
Brown rice, vegetables, peppers, and onions tossed with our house-made coconut curry
sauce.
Other Options
Grilled Cheeze $4.00
Ezekiel bread, your choice of cheeze, grilled.
Sloppy Moe $6.00
Ground tempeh sauteed with onions, peppers, garlic, tomatoes, brown sugar, cinnamon, and
liquid aminos. Slopped onto an Ezekiel bun.
Coney Dog $5.00
Vegan Sausage (soy and gluten) topped with grilled onions, peppers, and mushrooms.
Nestled in a whole wheat bun. Topped with your choice of condiments (ketchup, mayo,
relish, mustard).
Toona Melt $6.00
Jackfruit Salad (a vegan Toona made with jackfruit), provolone cheeze (or other cheeze of
your choice), relish, and seasonings. Grilled between two slices of sprouted grain bread.
Soul Food Saturdays Served all day on Saturday's $12.00
Options change weekly and include a selection of the following...
Macaroni and Cheeze, BBQ Lentil Loaf, Jamaican Jerk Vegetables, Collard Greens,
and Jalapeno Corn Bread,
Pizza Pie 10” with 8 slices OR Calzone $12.00

Cafe hours: Wednesday-Sunday from 10a-3p
Serving fresh, local vegetarian fare with light breakfast and lunch options as well as pastries and bread baked in-house. Nearly all of our menu options can accomodate gluten allergies upon request.
Free wi-fi is available on weekdays for cafe customers. On weekends, we have a no-laptop policy in the dining room. Metered street parking in front and in a private lot at the rear of the building.

Alchemi Brunch Creations
The Sorcerers Bananas Foster French Toast
$23.00
Carmelized flaming bananas bathing in a decadent house Foster sauce atop a stack of French toast. Served with dulce de leche whipped cream.
Witches Tower Pancakes
$19.00
Creme Brulée stuffed pancake stacks, with bourbon barrel aged maple syrup, raspberry coulis, fand resh berries.
Southern Sorcery Chicken and Waffles
$22.00
Grandma Lucy's fried chicken topped with savory sausage gravy on top of a waffle with a drizzle of bourbon barrel maple syrup.
Forest Alchemi Omelet
$18.00
Locally raised free range Amish eggs, rolled into a French style omelet. Filled with locally grown chestnut and oyster mushrooms, fresh spinach, house made bacon, and house made spinach ricotta cheese.
Scramble and Spell Avocado Toast
$21.00
Fresh avocado, on top of house made sourdough toast with heirloom tomatoes. Served with a vegan scramble of curried soft tofu, mushrooms, and spinach.
The Philosophers Crab and Shrimp Cake Benedict
$28.00
Fresh crab and shrimp cakes, topped with poached eggs, Hollandaise, on top of toasted house made sourdough. Garnished with local greens dressed in champagne vinaigrette.
Voodoo Shrimp and Grits
$26.00
Heirloom creamy and cheesy grits topped with sautéed jumbo shrimp in a spiced butter sauce. Garnished with house made bacon.
Elixer Waygu Strudel
$27.00
Waygu brisket and beef cheek strudel, topped with a poached egg and Bearnaise sauce. Served with an heirloom tomato with fresh basil microgreens and drizzled with 12-year balsamic vinegar.
Alchemi Farmer's Brunch Salad
$18.00
Local carrots, tomatoes, red onions, eggs, mushrooms, baby arugula, artisan greens, with another seasonal vegetable from our farmers, house made spinach ricotta cheese, and champagne vinaigrette.
Johnnys Favorites
Johnnys Steak Sandwich
$32.00
USDA Prime NY Strip steak, Porcini & Pepper rubbed with a crisp cast iron sear and topped with chimichurri, served open face on our house sourdough. Served with an heirloom tomato with fresh basil microgreens and drizzled with 12 year balsamic vinegar.
Apothecary's Huevos Ranchero
$19.00
Chipotle peppers, tomatillos, onions, tomato, adobo sauce, on corn chips, finished with chorizo, black beans, corn, poached eggs, and cotija sauce.
Lobster and Shrimp Pad Thai
$36.00
Rice Noodles crowned with shrimp and tossed in our Pad Thai Sauce, topped with half a lobster tail, scallions, peanuts, and bean sprouts.
The Alchemists Cut
$39.00
Succulent Lamb Loin cooked to order, served with rosemary roasted potatoes, farmers' greens, and a savory sauce.
'It Can Even Get Better' Sides
House made Sourdough Toast
$9.00
Whipped grass-fed butter and housemade strawberry jam.
Local Yukon Gold Rosemary Potatoes
$9.00
Grown right in the thumb, these baby potatoes are roasted with fresh rosemary and garlic and seasoned with maldon sea salt.
Boss Hogg Sausage
$12.00
Locally made jumbo breakfast Sausage.
The Alchemist's Bacon
$12.00
Local pork bacon house cured and coated with fresh cracked pepper, brown sugar, and coriander.

SASHIMI & NIGIRI
Nigiri is sushi made of thin slices of raw fish over pressed rice. Sashimi is thinly sliced fish, that is served without rice. Both are paired with yuzo-kosha sauce, sriracha, cilantro, roasted garlic & jalapeÃ±o pepper.
